loans.name: Felicita De Jesus

texts.es:
Felicita una mujer del campo, humilde, pero trabajadora, ella por un golpe del destino quedó viuda, pero lo más sorprendente del caso es que ella fue capaz de criar y levantar a la sorprendente cantidad de 10 hijos, todo un reto y ella se siente satisfecha de que pudo cumplir con su trabajo, la vida sigue adelante y ella continua rebuscando la manera de generar sustento y aunque no tenga los ánimos y la juventud, trabaja todos los días de la semana 5 horas por día en la cría y levante de cerdos.

Su sueño es poder generas los ingresos para tener una vida tranquila, comprar sus medicamentos, alimentos y solo trabajar y trabajar y seguir trabajando hasta que su salud se lo permita.

Ella quiere solicitar un pequeño monto de dinero para la compra de lechones, con este préstamo abastecerá sus cocheras, parte del capital se destinara para la compra de alimento para cerdos.
texts.en:
Felicita lives in the countryside. She is of humble circumstances but hardworking. She is a widow, but the most surprising thing about her case is that she was able to raise and bring up 10 children, which was a huge challenge and she feels a sense of fulfillment that she was able to complete that job. Life moves on and she continues looking for a way to earn a living, even though she doesn’t have the energy of youth. She works every day, 5 hours per day, raising pigs.

Her dream is to earn enough income to have a tranquil life, buy her medications and food, and to work and work and continue working as long as her health permits it.

She would like to request a small amount of money in order to buy piglets. With this loan she will be able to fill her pig pens. Part of the money will be used to buy pig feed.

loans.use: to buy piglets and pig feed.

loans.name: Gloria Estella

texts.es:
Gloria es una mujer de 48 años de edad, ella es una madre de 48 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos un adolescente y otro menor de edad, ella tiene un negocio de cría de cerdos, muy necesario en el equilibrio de su hogar por los ingresos que genera.

Ella quiere tener un negocio bien constituido con imagen corporativa muchos clientes, comerciales, y de solo soñar con esto la pone muy feliz y entusiasta.

De momento tiene que mejorar sus ventas, consolidar su negocio, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para iniciar con un nuevo producto en su negocio el cual será la cría de pollos, construirá un galpón y lo abastecerá con 200 pollos.

Apoya a esta empresaria dale una luz esperanza.
texts.en:
Gloria is 48 years old. She is a mother and lives with her husband and their two children. One is a teenager and the other is younger. She has a business raising pigs, which is very necessary to the economic balance in her household because of the income the business generates.

She wants to have a well-established business with a corporate image and many clients and stores. Just dreaming about this makes her very happy and enthusiastic.

At this time she needs to improve her sales and consolidate her business. In order to do this she needs a loan to start with a new product in her business, which will be raising chickens. She will build a chicken coop and stock it with 200 chickens.

Support this businesswoman and give her the light of hope.

loans.use: to buy 200 chickens.

loans.name: Crispus

texts.en:
Crispus is 28 years old and single, without children, and living in Kasese Uganda. 

For twelve years now, Crispus has been mining salt which he inherited from his parents. It has helped him earn a living and look after his brothers and sisters by paying for their school fees. 

He has a dream of constructing a good house despite weather changes being a challenge his business.  Crispus has asked for a loan to buy crude salt for selling.

loans.use: to buy crude salt for selling.

loans.name: Ubeimar Alonso

texts.es:
Ubeimar es un de los principales proveedores de hortalizas de Girardota, padre de dos hijos adolescentes, vive junto a su esposa y que de momento se encuentra sufriendo las inclemencias del clima, los fuertes cambios climáticos arrasan con sus cosechas, dejándole un margen de utilidad muy bajo y necesita con urgencia como contra-restar esta problemática.

Por ello ante la falta de capital debido a las pérdidas que ha tenido quiere solicitar un préstamo para la construcción de un invernadero, esto ayudara bastante a la problemática que tiene en el momento. 

Él préstamo es considerable debido a que sus terrenos son amplios, ayúdalo, no permitas que siga teniendo perdidas y que con tu ayuda pueda volver a llevar al mercado la cantidad de cultivo a los que lo tenían acostumbrados
texts.en:
Ubeimar is one of the main suppliers of vegetables in Girardota. He has two adolescent children. He lives with his wife and they are living through severe weather conditions at the moment. The strong climate changes destroy his harvests, leaving him with a very low profit margin, and he urgently needs to counteract this problem.

For this reason, in the face of the lack of capital due to his losses, he wants to request a loan for building a greenhouse. This will be quite helpful for dealing with the problem he currently has.
 
The loan is for a considerable amount as his land is expansive. Please help him. Do not allow him to continue having losses. With your help, he will be able to start taking the same quantity of crops to the market as before.

loans.use: to build a greenhouse that he urgently needs in order to stop the losses he has been having due to the weather

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, tiles, and iron for building a bathroom and laying down tiles

loans.name: Lulis Soley

texts.es:
Lulis es una mujer joven de 29 años de edad, vive junto con su pareja con la que tiene 3 hijos, dos princesas de 11 y 2 años de edad y un hombre de 12, ella es una mujer responsable, cariñosa y amorosa con sus hijos, ella sueña con una vida mejor, pagar la educación de sus niños, que en su hogar tengan una mejor alimentación, artículos para el entrenamiento de los niños, en pocas palabras está realizando todos los esfuerzos a su alcance para que su hogar prospere.

Lulis trabaja desde su hogar en la cría de cerdos, un negocio muy común y popular en las zonas rurales, de momento la actividad e ha tornado difícil, la razón es que necesita realizar adecuaciones a las cocheras, para proteger sus animales contra los repentinos cambios climáticos que esto también les afecta a ellos, comprar insumos que de momento tiene un elevado valor y el principal problema es que no cuenta con el dinero, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo con el cual realiza las modificaciones que necesita las cocheras y comprar lechones y alimento para cerdos.
texts.en:
Lulis is a young woman of 29. She lives with her partner, with whom she has three children, two princesses ages 11 and 2 and a man of 12. She is a responsible woman, caring and loving with her children. She dreams of a better life, to pay for the education of her children, to have a better diet in her home, and to have things for the entertainment of the children. In a few words, she is making all the efforts that she can so that her household prospers.

Lulis works at home raising pigs, a business that is very common and popular in the rural zones. At the moment, the business has been difficult. The reason is that she needs to make adaptations in the sheds in order to protect her animals from the sudden weather changes that also affect them and to buy supplies that at the moment have an elevated value. The principal problem is that she doesn't have the money. For this reason, she wants to apply for a loan, with which she will make the modifications that the sheds need and buy piglets and food for pigs.

loans.use: to buy piglets and food for pigs so that she can be more competitive and generate better sales.

loans.name: Andres Arcadio

texts.es:
Andres es un hombre de 48 años de edad, él vive junto con su pareja e hija, se dedica a la cría de cerdos, una actividad con la que esperar mantener a su familia y ser el motor de los sueños de ellos, pagar la educación de ella, realizar reparaciones a su hogar, como todo buen empresario quiere mejorar sus venta, su utilidad y este lo necesita ya que tiene el firme propósito de pagar la educación universitaria y se teme que con la utilidad que de momento genera no le alcanza, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo no para pagar la educación de su hija, es inteligente y prefiere invertirlo en su negocio, haciendo de este más rentable y poder pagar con su propio esfuerzo la carrera y mantenerla a largo plazo. 

Con el préstamo comprara cerdos + alimento, el principal beneficio de este es la cantidad de cerdos en las cocheras que le permitirá tocar las puertas del mundo mayorista, una actividad mucho más lucrativa para su negocio la cual no había iniciado por el temor al cambio.
texts.en:
Andres is a 48 year old man.  He lives together with his partner and daughter.  He works raising pigs, a job with which he hopes to maintain his family and be the engine for their dreams, pay for her education, and make repairs to his home.  

Like any good entrepreneur, he wants to improve his sales and income.  And he need this since it is his firm plan to pay for the college education of his daughter, and he fears that with the income that he makes at the moment, it will not be enough.  Therefore, he wants to request a loan, not to pay for his daughter's education; but, he is intelligent, and prefers to invest in his business, making it more profitable and be able to pay the degree with his own effort and maintain it in the long run.

With the loan, he will buy pigs and feed, the main benefit of this is the quantity of pigs in the pens that will allow him to open the doors to the wholesale world, a job much more lucrative for his business, which he had not begun for fear of change.

loans.use: To buy pigs and feed, he does this planning on becoming a wholesaler.

loans.name: Girasoles De Barrial Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal GIRASOLES DE BARRIAL, él banco está ubicado en la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Olga tiene 43 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura y crianza de animales, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a sus negocios los cuales le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a sus negocios, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando parta de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de semillas y abono.
Los socios se sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the communal bank "Girasoles de Barrial".  The bank is located in the province of La Convencion and the department of Cusco.
The partner Olga, 43, has two children and is attached.  The partner alternates her daily activities making a living from agriculture and raising animals.  She is a responsible and enterprising person.  The partner has been involved in her business for a long time and it goes well thanks to the effort she puts into her business every day.  She wants to be able to continue working in order to continue in this way supporting her family.  She is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds and manure.
The partners feel grateful for the loans offered and promise to follow through with the established payments.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es:
Claudia una mujer nacida y criada en el campo orgullosa de su profesión de levante de cerdos, esta emprendedora, genera el sustento no solo para ella sino para sus padres, los tiene en casa descansando disfrutando su madurez.

Ella se comprometió a consolidar un negocio, que sea auto sostenible, no se conformara con tener una cochera y producir el capital para vivir, ella quiere tener todo un imperio de cría de cerdos, ese es su sueño y propósito.

Claudia quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de cerdos, su idea es abastecer una cochera que ella misma construirá con una madera que tiene en el negocio, con poco capital conseguirá mucho, participa, presta ya, esta empresaria necesita de tu apoyo.
texts.en:
Claudia was born and raised in the countryside. She is proud of her occupation: rearing pigs. This enterprising woman supports not only herself but also her parents. She has them resting at home, enjoying their golden years.

She is committed to building a business and making it self-sustaining. She will not be satisfied with having a pigsty and just making ends meet. She wants to have a large-scale pig-raising business. This is her dream and goal.

Claudia is requesting a loan to purchase pigs. Her plan is to build a pigsty with some wood she has at her business and fill it with pigs. With little capital, she will gain a lot.

Get involved and support this businesswoman. She needs you.

loans.use: to buy pigs to fill her pigsties. She wants to become the main means of support for her family.

loans.name: Rosy Group

texts.es:
En el estado de Veracruz existen varias comunidades que preservan gran parte de su cultura y su lengua autóctona: la mazateca. El grupo denominado Rosy está integrado por siete habitantes de una comunidad ubicada en las cercanías del río Yale. Las actividades que realizan son: María R. y Nicolás venden pollo; Guadalupe, dulces, queso y huevo; Emilia, ropa; María, abarrotes y perfumes;  Sujey, zapatos, cosméticos y artículos de plata y finalmente Santa quien se dedica a la venta de tacos.

Doña Santa aprovechó el vivir cerca del río pues la afluencia de gente que lo visita se ha convertido poco a poco en la clientela de su taquería. El esposo de Doña Santa labora en el campo por las mañanas y en las tardes ayuda en el negocio, juntos han logrado dar educación a sus cinco hijos además de cubrir los gastos de la casa. 
   
Doña Santa vende tacos de bistec, de carne enchilada y de tripa acompañados de refrescos, cocos fríos, e incluso vende frutas de temporada como los nanches, las ciruelas o los mangos. Con las ganancias obtenidas ha podido comprar tres mesas y varias sillas, su siguiente meta es poder ampliar y remodelar el techo de la taquería.
   
El préstamo lo empleará para comprar, entre otras cosas, bistec, tripa, tortillas de harina, de trigo y refrescos de diferentes sabores y tamaños, ya que pretende extender el horario de venta, abrir el negocio a las 4pm y cerrar hasta las 12am con el fin de aprovechar el flujo de gente que visita el río.

   El grupo agradece todos los préstamos otorgados, ya que éstos han propiciado el crecimiento de cada integrante en sus respectivas actividades.

*En la fotografía Doña Santa viste blusa blanca con lunares negros.
texts.en:
In the state of Veracruz, there are many communities that have preserved a large part of their culture and native language, which is Mazateca. This group is named “Rosy” and consists of seven members from a community located on the banks of the Yale River. Their businesses are: María R. and Nicolás sell chicken; Guadalupe sells sweets, cheese, and eggs; Emilia sells clothing; María sells grocery items and perfumes; Sujey sells shoes, cosmetics, and silver items; and Santa sells tacos.

Santa has taken advantage of living near the river because a large number of people come to visit the river. They have slowly become her clients of her taco stand. Her husband works in the fields in the morning and in the afternoons he helps her with the business. Together they have been able to provide an education for their five children, in addition to covering the household expenses.

Santa sells steak tacos, chili tacos, and tripe tacos, served with soft drinks, cold coconuts, and she even sells seasonal fruits, such as nances [small yellow, acidic fruit], plums, and mangoes. With the profits she’s earned, she’s been able to buy three tables and several chairs. Her next goal is to expand and remodel the taco stand’s roof.

She will use the loan to buy, among other things, steak, tripe, flour tortillas, and different sizes and flavors of soft drinks. She plans to extend the taco stands hours; she will open at 4:00pm and close at 12:00am in order to take advantage of the influx of people who come to visit the river. 

The group is thankful for the loans that have been granted, since they have contributed to the growth of each member in their respective business. 

*In the photograph, Santa is wearing a white shirt with black dots.

loans.use: to buy steak, tripe, tortillas, and soft drinks )different flavors and sizes).

loans.name: Luz Mery

texts.es:
Ella es Luz Mery una mujer de 40 años de edad, madre cabeza de familia, con una pequeña de 4, se dedica a la venta de huevos, tiene un galpón amplio, donde el principal diferenciador con respeto a la competencia es que en su negocio todas las gallinas son criollas y alimentadas de maíz y cuido, estos animales debido a las propiedades nutritivas que ingieren y al color de su plumaje, dan huevos de excelente sabor y calidad, ella se siente muy orgullosa porque con su negocio genera el sustento para su hogar,  da un empleo y tiene bunas proyecciones de progreso.

Ella siempre se ha soñado con tener una granja de empaquete para no tener que tercerizar el servicio y aportar el empleo en su vereda.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de etiquetas de su producto y el resto del capital será invertido en el mantenimiento de sus estanques, donde alberga alimento, excremento del pollo y agua.
texts.en:
Luz Mery is a 40-year-old woman who is a female head of household with a four-year-old daughter.  She makes a living from the sale of eggs.  She has an ample barn in which the principal differentiator with respect to the competition is that all the hens are creoles and fed with corn and care.  These animals, due to the nutritional properties of what they eat and the color of their plumage, produce eggs of excellent taste and quality.  She is very proud because with her business she generates the sustenance for her home, provides work, and has good projections for growth.
She has always dreamed of having a packaging farm in order to not outsource the service and contribute employment to her neighborhood.
She is requesting a loan in order to purchase labels for her product and the rest of the capital will be invested in the maintenance of her tanks where she stores feed, chicken manure, and water.

loans.use: to buy labels for her brand and clean the storage tanks.

loans.name: Laura Margarita

texts.es:
Laura tiene 27 años, está casada, tiene 2 hijo vive en casa familiar en el barrio El coco de la Parroquia Natabuela de la Provincia de Imbabura, por el sector que ellos viven se dedican a la agricultura y también a ofrecer gastronomía como las fritadas con papas y tostado.
Laura realiza comercio de animales como pollo en ferias ambulantes de la provincia esta actividad lo viene realizando desde hace 4 años atrás en la actualidad es su fuente de ingresos que le ayuda en las necesidades del hogar además el esposo le ayuda con los gastos de los hijos, él trabaja como empleado haciendo postes de electricidad cerca del hogar, los dos velan por los hijos dando a diario lo mejor para que no pasen las mismas necesidades que pasaron y que sigan estudian para que en lo futuro sean personas de provecho y que les ayuden en el hogar a fortalecer más el negocio familiar que mantienen hoy en día, los hijos al regreso de clase le ayudan con el cuidado de los animales en este hogar están unidos en las buenas y en las malas.
Con el crédito que solicitan van a comprar más pollos para criar y sacar a las ferias y así seguir incrementando clientes y seguir fortaleciendo el negocio, agradece a Fundación Alternativa por el apoyo que le brindan con el crédito.
texts.en:
Laura is 27 years old. She is married and has two children. She lives in the family home in the El Coco neighborhood of the Natabuela parish of the province of Imbabura. In the sector where they live, the people work in agriculture and also offer gastronomy such as braised meats with potatoes and toasted corn.

Laura sells animals such as chickens in the traveling fairs in the province. She has been doing this work for four years. Now it is her source of income that helps her with the household necessities. In addition, her husband helps her with the children's expenses. He works as an employee making electrical poles near their home. The two of them look after their children, giving them the best every day so that they don't experience the same needs that they went through and so that they can continue going to school so that in the future they will be useful people who will help them in the household to further strengthen the family business that they now maintain. After school the children help her with the care of the animals. In this household, they are united in  good times and in bad.

With the loan that they are applying for, they are going to buy more chickens to raise and take to the fairs and thus continue increasing their customers and strengthening the business. 

She is grateful to Fundación Alternativa for the help that they are offering her with the loan.

loans.use: to buy more chickens.

loans.name: Les Etoiles (1) Group

texts.en:
Geneviève is a member of the community bank group Les Etoiles (1) in Brazzaville, the Republic of Congo. Helping to lead a subgroup of seven other micro-entrepreneurs, Geneviève has been running her business of selling smoked and salted fish for the past eight years. Geneviève is now on her second loan cycle with HOPE Congo since joining Les Etoiles (1), and will use her next loan to purchase large quantities of fish to restock her business. 

At the age of 52 and a mother of two, Geneviève ensures that she chooses the best fish and a good price to remain competitive and to keep her customers. One day she dreams of being able to grow her business and to diversify to be able to rent chairs and other items for events and parties. With those future revenues, she has plans to purchase a parcel of land where she can live with her children without having to pay rent.

loans.use: to purchase smoked and salted fish for her fish stand.

loans.name: Les Etoiles (2) Group

texts.en:
In 1998, Angelique started up her own business selling fresh vegetables in Brazzaville, the Republic of Congo. She is requesting a loan of 350,000 XAF to purchase green beans, peanuts, tomatoes, and a variety of other vegetables for her stand. Angelique is a member of the community bank Les Etoiles (2) and leads six other member of her group. While conserving her produce and keeping transportation costs down are a barrier to her success, Angelique makes sure to present her merchandise well and to speak clearly to her clients when they arrive at her shop. 

With her four children, Angelique dreams of expanding to own a butchery in front of her home and to one day connect her house to the electric grid to improve living conditions for herself and her family.

loans.use: to purchase green beans, peanuts, tomatoes, and a variety of other vegetables for her stand

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy timber to make furniture

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients.

loans.name: Sasita Grp Musoma Group

texts.en:
Peter is in his early 40s and is single with three children who are still at school. He has been running a retail shop and selling M-pesa for three years now.  He works from 7 a.m. to 8 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Peter's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He will use this loan to increase his shop inventory and to increase M-pesa stock to meet his customers' demand. He dreams of expanding his shop to be big.

Peter will share this loan with his loan group Sasita Grp Musoma, which consists of five members. They will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase his shop inventory and to increase his M-pesa stock to meet his customers' demand.

loans.name: Sumaq Causay De Acorcona Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SUMAQ CAUSAY DE ACORCONA”; Este banco se ubicado en el sector de Acorcona  en el distrito de Vilcabamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yobana, la socia continua con su  negocio de venta de frutas, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continua  vendiendo  plátanos, paltas, café entre otros, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar plátanos entre otros.
Los socios agradecen  a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
El socio que sale en la foto adjunta pidio permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
The members belong to the community bank "Sumaq Causay De Acorcona". This bank is located in the Acorcona sector in the Vilcabamba district in the department of Cusco.

This member is Yobana, who's still operating her fruit selling business. She has been working in this business for a long time and it's gone well thanks to the effort that she puts in every day at her business. This member is responsible and diligent, and she continues selling bananas, avocados, and coffee among other things since this is how the member supports her family.The member is applying for this loan to purchase bananas among other things.

The members are grateful to those that are a part of this dream through this platform and are committed to paying the loan installments in the stipulated period. The member who appears in the adjacent photograph asked for permission to arrive late at the meeting due to work-related reasons.

loans.use: To purchase bananas, among other things.

loans.name: Wazo Tegeta Group

texts.en:
Melania is 26 years old, single, and has two school age kids.  She has supported her family for 4 years by operating a charcoal business.  Melania works from 6am, when she opens her store and packs charcoal in sample buckets and sacks ready for sale, until 7pm. She is able to make a fair month profit.

This is her sixth credit request from Tujijenge Tanzania to be apportioned among the 3 member Wazo Tegeta group.  The group members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.  She used the previous loans to manage her business stock demand; buying sacks of charcoal every week because it is too costly to purchase larger quantities at once.  She managed to successfully repay the previous credits. 

Melania earned some extra income which she used to cover school fees and household expenses.  In the coming loan cycle, she would like to expand her business to maximize income for her family. 

She will use this credit to buy sacks of charcoal to resell.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal to resell.

loans.name: Twaha

texts.en: Twaha is a first-time borrower of UGAFODE Microfinance applying for a loan of UGX 2,000,000. He is a married man with four children. Twaha deals in coffee husks that he supplies to one of the companies in the city that uses them to burn bricks. He has done this kind of work for eight years now. From supplying the coffee husks, he managed to save money and purchase a small piece of land that he is now developing. He started constructing a simple residential house that got stuck along the way at the wall plate stage. He says he is tired of renting, yet his house is incomplete. Twaha thought of applying for a loan as a solution to the challenge. He wants to use the loan to purchase iron sheets, timber, and metallic doors and windows that shall be used in the house. He has high hopes of finishing his house when given the loan and also of educating his children

loans.use: To buy construction materials to finish building his house

loans.name: John Wilfer

texts.es:
John pertenece a la nueva generación de lecheros del Carmen de vivoral, es de los llamados a continuar con la tradición lechera de este sector que ha disminuido debido al bajo precio de venta de leche en el mercado, sin duda un ítem que está acabando con esta profesión.
 Las personas que siguen con dicha profesión que le ponen ganas, verraquera, entusiasmo, buscan alternativas para contra-restar dicha medida, una de ellas es comprar vacas, para mejorar la producción, está última es la decisión por la que Opto John.

John quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una vaca lechera en periodo de gestación.

Como la vaca está en periodo tiene un precio elevado, lo que justifica el valor del monto solicitado.
texts.en:
John belongs to the new generation of dairy farmers from Carmen de Vivoral, one of those who have been called upon to continue the area's dairy tradition, which has diminished due to the low sale price of milk in the market, something that is without a doubt ending this profession.
The people that continue with said profession and invest their effort, their tears, and their enthusiasm are looking for alternatives to turn things around, one of them being the purchase of cows to improve production. This option is what John has decided to do.

John wants to apply for a loan to purchase a dairy cow that's in gestation.

Since the cow is in this stage it has a higher price, which justifies the amount of the loan requested.

loans.use: To purchase a cow in gestation, which would increase daily production considerably

loans.name: Sonia Piedad

texts.es:
Sonia una mujer de 47 años de edad, soñadora, amorosa, trabajadora, se dedica a la confección a terceros en un taller que tiene ubicado en su casa, ella trabaja para bordar su futuro, se empeña en alcanzar sus metas, quiere tener un hogar propio, un taller de confección con 10 empleados y devolver a Colombia sus épocas dorados de confección.

Sonia tiene una hija adolescente que se encuentra estudiando en la universidad ella paga su matrícula, se encarga de los gastos del hogar.

De momento la principal ambición de Sonia es aumentar la utilidad que gana de las prendas, mejorar sus tiempos de producción y maquilar prendas en tela, para ello necesita de por lo menos dos máquinas planas pero no cuenta con el capital, por esta razón quiere solicitar un préstamo para poder comprarlas, teniendo como principal beneficio, la confección de prendas en tela.
texts.en:
Sonia is a 47 year old woman who's a loving, hard-working dreamer who works doing production for private orders from the workshop that she has in her home. She works to improve her future, and strives to achieve her goals. She wants to have her own home, a garment-making workshop with 10 employees, and take Colombia back to its golden age of garment-making.

Sonia has a teenage daughter who's in college. She pays for her tuition and is in charge of household expenses.

Currently Sonia's main ambition is to increase the profitability of her garments, improve production time, and assemble garments on cloth. To do so she needs at least two stitching machines but lacks the capital to do so. It's for this reason that she's requesting a loan to be able to buy them, and the main benefit would be the production of garments on cloth.

loans.use: To purchase a type of stitching machine to focus on the production of cloth garments

loans.name: Dios Es Amor Group

texts.en:
Exactly one year ago in April 2014, the Friendship Bridge Trust Bank "Dios es Amor,” or “God is Love,” received their first loan. The group was made up of 11 hardworking and enthusiastic women who shared a common vision of improving themselves, working harder with the goal of maintaining and growing their small businesses. The ladies happily report that this first loan has been paid back fully, and that they are requesting an additional loan from Kiva.  Currently, there are 10 women in the Trust Bank who share that they are most grateful for the loan as it has been such a huge help for them and their families.

For the first loan cycle, we featured Antonia whose goal was to attract more customers and generate more income to raise her standard of living. Antonia was able to maintain and expand sales for her textile business, which included the sale of traditional blouses, napkins, tablecloths and aprons. With her increased income, she was able to purchase materials (wood and tiles) and other supplies to fufill a long-time dream of constructing her home. With a new loan, Antonia would like to purchase raw, materials including traditional fabric, as well as fabric for lining. She would also like to buy thread, trim and decorations for blouses, napkins, tablecloths and aprons.

Antonia and her friends in the Trust Bank participate in educational seminars at their monthly meetings. A Friendship Bridge Loan Officer exposes the women to knowledge about the world around them and within them. Using pictures, drawing and role playing, the women learn about empowerment, how to raise their self-esteem, and the rights that they have as women. They learn to care for themselves and their families with new information about nutrition, health, hygiene and the use of medicinal plants. Finally, the ladies learn to effectively manage their loans and small businesses as they learn about budgeting, marketing, customer service, accounting and pricing. Friendship Bridge calls the combination of small loans and education “Microcredit Plus.”

The 10 women in the “Dios es Amor” Trust Bank express their appreciation to Kiva and Friendship Bridge for the assistance in the form of loans and education that helps them improve their businesses and realize progress in their lives. Thank you, Kiva lenders!

loans.use: to purchase raw materials, including traditional fabric, as well as fabric for lining

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy vulcanizing (rubber curing) equipment

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, iron, brick, sand, and gravel to build an embankment.

loans.name: Dipak

texts.en:
After managing a Dunkin Donuts for almost four years, Dipak wanted to be more independent in his career. Starting from scratch, the transition from old job to self-employed new job was difficult, but with a lot of hard work, Mahopac Deli was born. 

Originally from Nepal, Dipak has lived in the U.S. for 14 years. He lives with his cousin and son, who help him out at the deli. His greatest pride is being able to serve people and be independent. However, he has run into the challenge of obtaining enough capital to invest and grow his business to its full potential. 

This loan will be used to purchase new equipment for the store, as well as ingredients to start ice cream sales in the summer. His goals for the future are to improve both his business and his personal credit. 

Check out his website at www.mahopac-deli.com.

loans.use: to purchase equipment and ingredients to start selling ice cream at his deli

loans.name: Abel Antonio

texts.es:
Muy sonriente y alegre así es Abel, un veterano vendedor de sombreros que paralelo tiene un negocio de cría y levante de cerdos, alterna sus actividades debido al tiempo muerto que le queda y al ser una persona inquieta y que gusta de trabajar hace lo posible por entretenerse en algo productivo que le signifique ingreso de capital.

 Abel que con su negocio orgullosamente mantiene a sus dos pequeños una de 5 y otro de 3 y a su pareja sentimental, busca un apoyo que le permita incentivar la venta de cerdos, pues se ha visto afectado por los precios de la competencia y quiere estar a la par de ellos.

Solicita un préstamo para a compra de  alimento de cerdos y abastecer sus cocheras de cerdos.

El propósito de hacer crecer su negocio son sus dos hijos esos pequeños que han llenado de alegría su vida y que hará todo lo que este en sus manos para engrandecer y dejarles un buen legado a ellos.
texts.en: Abel is happy and has a big smile. He is an experienced hat salesman who, in parallel, runs a business of raising and feeding pigs. He alternates these activities because of the idle time he has,  and being a restless person who likes to work, he does everything possible to dedicate himself to something productive which will result in capital revenue. Abel supports his two young children ages 5 and 3 and his sentimental partner. He is looking for support which will allow him to promote the sale of pigs. He has been affected by competitive prices and he wants to be aligned with them. He is asking for a loan to buy pig food and supply his pig corrals. The purpose of growing this business is his two children, those two little ones who have filled his life with joy. He will do whatever is in his hands to help them grow, and leave a legacy for them.

loans.use: To promote the sale of pigs. and invest the full amount in pigs.

loans.name: Amalia Lisseth

texts.es:
Amalia, de 23 años de edad, está acompañada y vive junto a su compañero de vida, en la casa de sus suegros, aún no tienen hijos, pero pronto quieren tener.

Amalia, tiene una pequeña tienda desde hace dos años y hasta el día de hoy le ha ido muy bien; es por eso que quiere ampliarla un poco más. 

Amalia, necesita el préstamo para comprar golosinas, gaseosas, jabón, detergente, frijoles, pan y azúcar para su tienda, para surtirla más y percibir mejores ganancias. 

Amalia, sueña con lograr hacer que su negocio crezca en corto tiempo.
texts.en:
Amalia is 23 years old, married, and lives with her husband at her in-laws’ house.  She doesn’t have any children yet, but wants to have some soon.

Amalia has had a small store for two years but things have not gone well for her, so she wants to expand it a bit.

Amalia needs a loan to buy sweets, carbonated beverages, soap, detergent, beans, bread, and sugar for her store, so she can better stock it and have better earnings.

Amalia dreams of growing her business within a short time.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Jhon Edwin

texts.es:
Jhon un hombre de 28 años de edad, verraco, trabajador, honesto, habilidoso, un hombre que se focaliza mucho en su futuro y prefiere estar solo por un tiempo mientras consolida su negocio de carpintería antes de ir en busca de una familia ya que le importa mucho tener un hogar estable económicamente.

Desde el año 2005 se ha preocupado por crear un ambiente de trabajo sano, siempre ser muy recto con sus pagos, honesto con sus clientes y justo con sus precios, de momento su negocio prospera y espera este momento para iniciar a comprar activos fijos que le aporte a su crecimiento.

Jhon quiere comprar una máquina caladora, este insumo le permitirá cortar madera de manera más eficaz y pulida, será un gran aporte a su crecimiento y de verdad agradece de corazón a todo aquel que le pueda ayudar.
texts.en: Jhon is a 28 year old man who's hard-working, energetic, honest, and skilled, a man who's very focused on his future and who prefers to stay on his own while he consolidates his carpentry business before he tries to start a family. It's because he really cares about having a financially stable home. Since 2005 he has tried to create a healthy work environment, be very responsible with his payments, honest with his customers and fair with his prices. Currently his business is thriving and he was waiting for this moment to buy machinery to contribute to its growth. Jhon wants to buy a jigsaw, as this equipment would allow him to cut wood more efficiently and smoothly. It would contribute greatly to the growth of his business and he would be grateful from the bottom of his heart to anybody who could help him.

loans.use: To purchase a jigsaw, to make more efficient and smoother cuts.

loans.name: Dalia

texts.en: Dalia is a hardworking lady from Kitebero, Katete Mbarara district. She is an educated woman and started a school with few children but the enrollment has grown to about 300. She started with a nursery section but now she has all the classes. She is trying to put all classes because the number is increasing daily and her dream is to put up a standard school which will attract all the Ugandans. She has applied for UGX 5,000,000 to buy construction and scholastic materials for her school. This will help to cater to the rising number of pupils at the school. She is confident this will also help to come up with an increase in income. She appreciates the Kiva support toward her project. Pictured is Dalia in the school compound.

loans.use: To buy construction and scholastic materials for the school

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria has trained over 200 brokers, managed over 100 insurance agencies, and been in the insurance business for over 20 years. She always wanted to have her own insurance agency, and with all her knowledge, she decided it would be a good idea to go into the business on her own. A native Texan, her work supports herself and her 15-year-old son. 

Maria’s greatest success has been having the opportunity to accomplish her dreams. To continue to perform the work she loves, she plans to improve her business as much as possible. This loan will be used to establish a line of credit for her business. 

In the future, her personal goals are to be a successful and morally upright person, to be a trusted advisor, and to continue to run an honest agency and service the needs of her fellow Florida residents.

loans.use: to establish a line of credit for her insurance company

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy various products

loans.name: Licinia Milena

texts.es:
Licinia una emprendedora, talentosa, responsable, amorosa y tierna mujer de 32 años de edad, que careció de estudio pero nunca de ideas y de ímpetu por progresar, vive junto con su pareja con la que tiene 2 hijas de 8 y 2,  junto con su pareja son los encargados de generar esperanza, de generar sueños de progreso para su familia, de alimentar la ilusión de sus hijas para que estas se superen y busquen una mejor vida que la que Licinia vive.


Licinia es una vendedora de productos de papelería, cuadernos, carpetas, lapiceros, portaminas, borradores, sacapuntas, marcadores, reglas, entre otros, su negocio es muy básico y es por ello que cree que sus ventas no aumentan, puesto que no cuenta con servicio de fotocopiadora y ve que muchos negocio ahora tiene integrado el servicio de cibercafé, fax, entre otros, por ello pensando en equilibrarse en el mercado para no exponerse a un riesgo de desaparecer Licina pide un aliento económica para invertirlo en la compra de los siguientes tres productos:(fotocopiadora, fax, computador), todo pensando para mejorar sus ventas.

Su gran sueño es poder tener una vivienda propia para compartir junto a su familia y quiere que su negocio de papelería sea el gestor de dicha hazaña
texts.en:
Licinia is a 32 year old woman who is enterprising, talented, loving and sweet. She lacked in studies but never in ideas and momentum for progress. She lives with her partner with whom she has 2 daughters, 8 and 2 years old. Along with her partner, she is in charge of generating hope and dreams of progress for their family, of feeding the illusion of her daughters that they better themselves and search for a better life than that which Licinia lives. 

Licinia is a seller of stationary products, notebooks, folders, pens, mechanical pencils, erasers, pencil sharpeners, rulers, among others. Her business is very basic and it's for that reason that she thinks her sales are not growing, since she does not have a photocopy service and sees that many businesses now have integrated services of cyber cafes, fax, and others. 

Therefore, thinking about evening herself out in the market and not exposing herself to a risk of disappearing, Licinia is asking for an economic inspiration to invest in the purchase of the following three products: photocopier, fax machine, and computer, all in thoughts of improving her sales. 

Her big dream is to be able to have her own home to share with her family and she wants her stationary store to be the manager of said great feat.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier, fax machine, and computer, all in thoughts of improving her sales.

loans.name: Alen

texts.en:
Alen is 45 years old and married.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries like spices, snack foods, canned goods and other miscellaneous items.

Alen has borrowed and paid 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from charcoal retailing.

Alen aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries like spices, snack foods, canned goods and other miscellaneous items.

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es:
María es una humilde trabajadora de 48 años de edad, responsable, cordial, sonriente, trabaja desde su casa en la venta de alimentos, como almuerzos, fiambres (ricos almuerzos envueltos en hoja de plátanos), el negocio lo inicio por necesidad económica, quería aportar al mantenimiento del hogar ya que su esposo no podía con todo el peso de las responsabilidades, aprovecho su cocina e inicio con la venta de alimentos.

La falta de capital ha sido el principal impedimento para que la empresaria pueda mejorar, expandirse y llegar a muchas tiendas con sus productos, pero gracias a un “amigo” quien le ayudara con un préstamo podrá comprar dos activos muy importantes para reducir los tiempos de operación en la preparación de sus alimentos.

María pide a la comunidad Kiva que sea su amigo, con el préstamo comprara un horno y un molino eléctrico.
texts.en:
Maria is a hard-working 48 year old woman of modest means who's responsible, cordial, cheerful, and works from home selling food such as lunches, and fiambres (delicious meals wrapped in banana leaves). She started this business because of financial need, and wanted to contribute financially to the household because her husband wasn't able to handle the whole burden. She took advantage of her cooking and started selling food.

The lack of capital has been the main obstacle to this entrepreneur's growth and expansion to many stores with her products. But thanks to a "friend" who will help her with a loan she'll be able to buy two very important fixtures to shorten the prep time for her dishes.

Maria is asking the Kiva community to be her friend, and with a loan she'll buy an oven and an electric grinder.

loans.use: To purchase an oven and an electric grinder for food preparation.

loans.name: Ignacio De Jesus

texts.es:
Ignacio es un hombre de 62 años, ha recorrido gran parte de su vida, donde ha tenido incontables experiencias laborales, hoy por hoy se dedica a atender una tienda de productos de la canasta familiar, un negocio que nació de la necesidad económica por mantener su hogar que lo conforma su pareja sentimental y 4 princesas de 6, 12, 14, 16 años, todas ellas menores de edad que necesitan mucho de su padre y que su sostenimiento depende netamente de él.

Ignacio trabaja con gusto porque sabe que esos ingresos sirven para el progreso de su hogar, para tener a sus hijas estudiando, para que se alimenten bien, lleven cualquier moneda al colegio y gasten, por ello se siente orgullo y afortunado de tener esa tienda de abarrotes.

Al tener una tienda lo más importante es que este siempre abastecida y los clientes encuentren los productos en la medida que lo necesiten, por ello Ignacio quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido, solo por nombrar algunos, frijoles, papeletas de refrescos, mantequilla, pañales, cigarrillos, papel higiénico, café, chocolate, arroz, panela, quesito, leche.
texts.en: Ignacio is 62 years old. He has spent a great part of his life on innumerable work experiences. Today, he works in a store selling market basket products. This business started from the financial need to support his household, formed with his partner and 4 princesses ages 6,12,14 and 16 years old. All of them minors, who need a lot from their father and whose support depends solely on him.  Ignacio works gladly because he knows that this income helps with the household progress, to have his daughters studying. to feed them well, to take some money to school and be able to spend it. Thus, he feels proud and fortunate to have this small grocery store. The most important thing to have a store is that it must always be supplied and customers must get their products as they need them. Thus Ignacio is asking for a loan to buy an assorted variety such as beans,  soda pops, butter, diapers, cigarettes, toilette paper, coffee, chocolate, rice, whole cane sugar, cheese, and milk.

loans.use: To supply the following products: (beans, soda pops, butter, diapers, cigarettes, toilette paper, coffee, chocolate, rice, whole cane sugar, cheese, milk.)

loans.name: Juan David

texts.es:
Juan David un joven talentoso muy poli funcional de 28 años de edad, dedicado cuerpo y alma al trabajo, un hombre humilde que piensa primero siempre en sus padres que su beneficio propia, es soltero, vive con ellos y se dedica a prestar servicios generales de reparaciones eléctricas, plomería, pintura, acabados, reparaciones para el hogar etc. 

Juan David cuenta con un empleado, le da infinitas gracias a su hermano pues fue con él con quien aprendió todo acerca del oficio, pero después de un tiempo dejo de trabajar con este y se dedicó a crecer como independiente, un pedido que le había hecho su hermano pensando en su progreso.
 
Juan David en el momento se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de dos equipos de alpinismo, la razón es que ha tenido un buen éxito y ahora requieren sus servicios para unidades, edificios, en pocas palabras zonas que requieren pro obligación de este equipo.

Te invitamos a que preste a Juan David, un apoyo será aportar el crecimiento de este joven.
texts.en:
Juan David is a very versatile, talented, 28 year old man who has put his heart and soul into his work. He's a modest man who always puts his parents ahead of his own interest, he's single and lives with them and works in providing general electrical, plumbing, painting, finishing, and home repair services.

Juan David has an employee. He's infinitely grateful to his brother since he learned everything about the trade from him, but after a period of time he stopped working with him and committed himself to working independently at the request of his brother who was thinking about his progress.

Juan David is currently applying for a loan to purchase mountain climbing equipment, the reason being that he has had great success and his services are now needed for units, buildings, basically areas that require this equipment.

We invite you to make a loan to Juan David, a source of support that would contribute to the growth of this young man.

loans.use: To purchase mountain climbing gear for himself and his employee.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Maria, estudio hasta bachillerato, por motivos personales y economicos ya no pudo continuar sus estudios, es madre soltera y vive con su hijo de 11 años, que estudia quinto grado en la escuela de su caserio.

Maria, trabaja en una panaderia que está cerca de su casa, se presenta a trabajar todos los días a las 6:00 a.m. y sale a las 4:00 pm.

El prestamo lo utilizara para terminar de construir una parte de su vivienda.

Sus sueños para el futuro son poder sacar adelante a su hijo y darle un mejor futuro, gracias a CREDICAMPO a logrado alcanzar muchas de las metas que se tenia propuestas y que ahora con el apoyo de KIVA podra hacer sus sueños realidad.
texts.en: Maria studied until the end of secondary school, but couldn't continue her studies for personal and financial reasons.  She's a single mother and lives with her 11-year-old son, who's in 5th grade at the school in their village.  Maria works in a bakery near her house.  She works from 6:00 AM to 4:00 PM every day.  She'll use her loan to finish building part of her home.  Her dreams for the future are to be able to provide for her son and give him a better future.  Thanks to CrediCampo, she's managed to achieve many of the goals she set for herself, and now, with the help of Kiva, she'll be able to make her dreams a reality.

loans.use: finish building part of her home

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy groundnut paste

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy smoked fish for resale.

loans.name: Cecilia Yaneth

texts.es:
Cecilia, estudio hasta octavo grado en una escuela a distancia, no pudo continuar estudiando porque desde pequeña ha tenido que trabajar, porque su madre emigro a Estados Unidos y ella quedo cuidando a sus hermanos menores.- Ahora, está casada y tiene dos hijas.

Cecilia, es empleada, se presenta a trabajar a las 6:00 a.m. y sale hasta las 4:00 p.m.

Ella está solicitando un préstamo para cancelar algunas deudas personales que adquirio hace un tiempo y agradece a la institucion por el apoyo y poder resolver sus necesidades.

Sus sueños son, ver a sus hijas formadas profesionalmente, tambien espera seguir trabajando y hacer realidad sus sueños para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Cecilia attended school long-distance up to the eighth grade, but was unable to continue studying because she had to work when she was young, because her mother emigrated to the United States and she was left to take care of her younger siblings. Now she's married and has two daughters.

Cecilia is employed and shows up to work at 6:00 AM, and gets off at 4:00 PM.

She's requesting a loan to pay off some personal debts that she took on some time ago and she's grateful to the institution for the support and for enabling her to take care of her needs.

Her dreams are to see her daughters develop themselves as professionals, and also hopes to continue working so that she make she and her family's dreams come true.

loans.use: To pay off a few personal debts that she took on a while ago.

loans.name: Dina Edith

texts.es:
Dina, vive en casa propia junto a una hija de 20 años de edad, ella elabora sopa de puya (esta sopa es un plato típico de El Salvador se hace con tripas y nervios de las patas de la res se le agrega verduras y condimento) para vender, su hija la apoya en el negocio, inicio su propio negocio hace cuatro años con la motivación de una amiga.
Como una manera de dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes ha decidido solicitar un crédito para invertirlo en ollas, cucharas y abastecerá con materia prima su negocio cada vez que sea necesario, comprando verduras, condimentos y los derivados de res, espera contar con todo lo necesario para que sus ventas e ingresos sean mejores para resarcir su deuda.
Sueña con tener un negocio más grande y reconocido en su localidad,
texts.en:
Dina lives in her own home with her 20-year-old daughter.  She makes and sells sopa de puya (a traditional soup dish from El Salvador made from cow stomach, the sinews of cow's feet, vegetables, and seasoning).  Her daughter helps her out with this business, which she started 4 years ago with the encouragement of a friend.  

As a way to provide better service to her clients, she has decided to apply for a loan to buy pots and spoons and supply her business with primary ingredients such as vegetables, seasoning, and beef products every time she needs them.  She hopes to be able to count on everything that she needs so that her sales and income will improve so that she can pay back her debt.  Her dream is to have a bigger business that is well-known in the area.

loans.use: to buy pots and spoons and supply her business with primary ingredients such as vegetables, seasoning, and beef products every time she needs them

loans.name: Safiatou's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été créé le 12 Septembre 2013 lors de l’inauguration leur banc villageois, le groupe compte des femmes qui en majorité ont acquis de solides expériences dans le petit commerce qui se trouvent être leur activité principale.

Madame Safiatou (debout à l’extrême droite avec une main levée) est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle âgée de 60 ans,  veuve, mère de 09 enfants dont 03 filles et 06 garçons. Elle s’active dans la dans la vente de poissons de frais. Elle achète les poissons à Ziguinchor pour venir les revendre dans sa région.

Avec ce prêt, elle compte acheter 10 à 20 kg de poissons à 800f le kg et le revendre à 1500f en détails. Aprés écoulement en racheter et refaire de même.

Les bénéfices lui permettront de finir les constructions de sa pièce pour le mettre en location et prendre aussi ses enfants en charge.
texts.en:
This group was created on 12 September 2013 at the inauguration of the 'Banc Villageois'.  The women have built up solid experience in the retail of various products.

Safiatou (standing on the right in the photo with her hand raised) is the group representative.  She is 60 years old, widowed and mother to nine children, three girls and six boys.  She sells fresh fish which she buys in Ziguinchor and brings back to her region for sale.  She plans to buy between ten and twenty kilos of fish for 800 francs CFA a kilo.  She will then retail the fish for 1,500 francs CFA a kilo.  She will then repeat the process.

Safiatou's profits will enable her to finish building a house which she will rent out, and take care of her children.

loans.use: to buy 10 to 20 kilos of fish for resale.

loans.name: Fred

texts.en:
Fred is a 45-year-old hardworking man and a resident of Bukanga Isingiro.  His brother is a good farmer and Fred, seeing what his brother was earning from his plantations, worked for 6 years and then acquired three acres of land and planted bananas.  

He is now earning money to meet his household needs but the plantation needs manure and labor and he is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 UGX  purposely for buying manure for his plantations.  He hopes with the manure that his yields will increase and so will his sales and profit.  He appreciates the extension of services from UGAFODE to rural areas.  He is hard working.

loans.use: to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Ramatoulaye's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été créé le 12 Septembre 2013 lors de l’inauguration leur banc villageois, le groupe compte des femmes qui en majorité ont acquis de solides expériences dans le petit commerce qui se trouvent être leur activité principale.
  
Madame Ramatoulaye (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée, âgée de33 ans et  mère de 04 enfants dont 01 fille et 03 garçons. Son activité consiste à acheter et revendre des fruits saisonniers la gare routière. 

Ce nouveau prêt lui permettra d’acheter 03 sacs de fruits  à 7000f l’un pour les  revendre à 200f le kg et en détails aussi et après écoulement en racheter et refaire de même.

Les bénéfices lui permettront de participer activement à la gestion des charges familiales, surtout à la scolarité de ses enfants et aider son mari à la location de la maison.
texts.en:
This group was created on 12 September 2013 at the inauguration of the 'Banc Villageois'.  The women have built up solid experience in the retail of various products.

Ramatoulaye (standing on the right in the photo with her hand raised) is the group representative.  She is 33 years old, married and mother to four children, one girl and three boys.  She sells fresh fruit in season, at the roadside.  She plans to buy three sacks of fruit for 7,000 francs CFA a sack.  She will then retail the fruit for 200 francs CFA a kilo.  She will then repeat the process.

Ramatoulaye's profits will enable her to contribute to the costs of her household, principally the education of her children, and help her husband to pay the rent for their house.

loans.use: to buy 3 sacks of fruit for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy condiments

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy condiments

loans.name: Aissatou's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été créé le 12 Septembre 2013 lors de l’inauguration leur banc villageois, le groupe compte des femmes qui en majorité ont acquis de solides expériences dans le petit commerce qui se trouvent être leur activité principale. 
 
Madame Aissatou (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main levée) est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est veuve, mère de 07 enfants dont 01 fille et 06 garçons et âgée de 48 ans. Elle s’active dans la transformation de céréales locales à son domicile et la place auprès de boutiquiers qui se chargent de l’écoulement de la marchandise.

Avec ce prêt, elle compte acheter 05 sacs de 50 kg de mil à 15000f le sac et 05 sacs de mais à 15000f le sac aussi et après transformation elle vend le produit fini à 700 f le kg.

Les bénéfices lui permettront d’aider son mari dans la dépense quotidienne et augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
This group was created on 12 September 2013 at the inauguration of the 'Banc Villageois'.  The women have built up solid experience in the retail of various products.

Aissatou (sitting on the right in the photo with her hand raised) is the group representative.  She is 48 years old, widowed and mother to seven children, one girl and six boys.  She processes and sells cereals at her home, which she then places with shopkeepers for resale.  She plans to buy five 50 kilo sacks of millet for 15,000 francs CFA a sack, and five sacks of maize for 15,000 francs CFA a sack.  She will then retail the finished product for 700 francs CFA a kilo.  

Aissatou's profits will enable her to help her husband provide for their daily expenses and increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy 5 sacks of millet and 5 sacks of maize for processing and resale.

loans.name: Esdras Naun

texts.es: Esdras, tiene 21 años de edad, esta soltero, vive junto a sus padres en una aldea de Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. Desde muy pequeño se ha dedicado a la agricultura con sus padres y también estuvo estudiando. Hace 3 años mantiene su propia finca de café, la que le genera ingresos para su familia. El préstamo que esta solicitando es por 10,000 Lempiras y es para darle mantenimiento a su finca de café, va comprar abonos y fertilizantes para mejorar su finca y las cosechas. Tiene como meta seguir sembrando café para ayudar mas a su familia y superarse económicamente.
texts.en:
Esdras is 21 years old and single.  He lives with his parents in the village of Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara.  He has been working on the farm with his parents since he was very young, and he has also been studying.  He has had his own coffee plantation for 3 years that provides income for the family.  

He is applying for a loan of 10,000 Lempiras in order to maintain his coffee crops.  He will buy manure and fertilizer to improve his farm and the harvest that he gets from it.  His goal is to continue growing coffee to help his family more and to improve his economic situation.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer to apply to his coffee plantation

loans.name: Luis Cleotilde

texts.es: Luis es un hombre trabajador que tiene 31 años de edad en la casa que construyo en su propiedad hace varios años, junto a él vive su hijo de 11 años de edad y su compañera de vida. La carpintería le ha permitido llevar el sustento a su hogar, oficio que realiza desde ya varios años, por lo que gracias a su experiencia y carisma ha logrado construir un negocio de éxito. Luis ha logrado construir el corredor en su vivienda, por lo que se siente muy feliz y agradecido ya que gracias a ello ha instalado una pequeña tienda de productos básicos en su vivienda la cual es administrada por su compañera de vida, todo gracias al apoyo de un crédito que le brindo la institución, gracias a la buena experiencia Luis desea solicitar un nuevo crédito el cual invertirá en la compra de un vehículo para transportar materiales y productos de su negocio, por lo  que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en un vehículo para transportar materiales y productos de su negocio.
texts.en:
Luis is a hard-working 31-year-old man who lives with his 11-year-old son and life partner in a house that he built on his property several years ago.  His profession as a carpenter has allowed him to support his household, and he has been doing this job for several years.  Thanks to his experience and charisma, he has been able to build a successful business.  

Thanks to a loan provided by the institution, Luis has successfully constructed a hallway in his home, which he is grateful and happy for since it allowed him to install a small store selling basic necessities in his home that is managed by his partner.  Thanks to this good experience, Luis wants to apply for a new loan from FUSAI that he will invest in a vehicle to transport materials and products for his business.

loans.use: to invest in a vehicle to transport materials and products for his business

loans.name: Awa's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe créé depuis juin 2008 regroupe en son sein des membres qui habitent la même ville et sont solidairement liés par une responsabilité de remboursement de leur crédit.
Elles ont comme activité en générale le commerce.

Diaoly qui se trouve à droite de la photo et levant la main est notre emprunteuse vedette,elle est âgée de 35 ans, est mariée et mére de  05 enfants dont 04 garçons.

Son activité est le commerce de tissus teintés,elle s'approvisionne au niveau du grand marché pour venir revendre en ville.

Elle compte acheter 114 métres de tissus thioub pour une valeur de 200000f.

Avec les bénéfices,elle désire augmenter son épargne et satisfaire ses besoins.
texts.en:
This group was created in June 2008 and is made up of women who live in the same town and work together to repay their loans.  The women all retail various products.

Diaoly (standing on the right in the photo with her hand raised) is the group representative.  She is 35 years old, married and mother to five children, one girl and four boys.  She sells dyed fabrics which she buys in the main market and brings back to her town for sale.  She plans to buy 114 metres of dyed damask fabric for a total of 200,000 francs CFA.  

Diaoly's profits will enable her to provide for her needs and increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy dyed fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Salima

texts.ru:
Салима  трудолюбивая женщина 49 лет. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Салима очень жизнерадостная женщина. Она занимается земледелием и животноводством. Её муж работает мастером на стройке и получает небольшою прибыль. В зимний период он занимается откормом скота. 
Салима  обратилась в Арванд за кредитом  для покупки минеральный удобрений. Так как сейчас сезон полевых работ они хотят расширить своq бизнес по выращиванию сельхозкультур. Салима заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Salima is a hardworking 49-year-old woman. She is married and has three children. Salima is a very happy woman. She is involved in farming and animal husbandry. Her husband works as a foreman at a construction site and earns a small profit. In the winter, he is involved in fattening up livestock.

Salima requested a loan from Arvand to buy mineral fertilizers. Since it is now the season for field work, they want to expand their agricultural business. Salima thanks Arvand for the support in advance.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Rosario Guadalupe

texts.es:
Rosario, es una mujer muy trabajadora, está casada y vive con su esposo y sus hijos, su esposo es agricultor y ella es ama de casa.

Rosario, se dedica a los oficios domésticos, pero también le ayuda a su esposo en la agricultura, gracias al apoyo que se dan mutuamente, han logrado tener lo que hasta hoy poseen.

Rosario, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas y pagar mano de obra, para sembrar, porque ya se acerca el invierno y necesitan preparar la tierra y tener todo listo para sembrar. 

Rosario, desea tener mejores condiciones de vida para ella y su familia y sabe que con mucho esfuerzo, sacrificio y la ayuda de KIVA y CREDICAMPO lo logrará.
texts.en:
Rosario is a hardworking woman.  She’s married and lives with her husband and children.  Her husband is a farmer and she is a housewife.

Rosario works in the home but also helps her husband with farming and they have managed to have what they possess.

Rosario needs a loan to buy farming supplies and pay for labor in order to plant because winter is approaching and they need to prepare the land and have it ready to sow.

Rosario wants to better her and her family’s living conditions and knows that with much effort, sacrifice, and help from Kiva and CREDICAMPO, she will be able to do it.

loans.use: to buy supplies and pay for labor.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy various products

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy cereal

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy smoked fish

loans.name: Cesar Mauricio

texts.es:
César, práctica el cultivo de granos básicos y ganadería, es casado y tiene un hijo de tres años de edad, convive solo con su familia, su tiempo lo distribuye de una manera que pueda atender a su familia y su negocio, no tiene familiares en el extranjero que le brinden apoyo económico, el oficio lo heredo de sus padres desde su niñez.
Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas y ganado, fortalecerá sus actividades económicas, espera tener cosechas de granos básicos abundantes y aumentar la ganadería para comercializarlo, ya que con ello sus ingresos serán mayores y con facilidad cancelara su deuda.
César desea hacer una buena inversión de la deuda para que su negocio sea más rentable y así junto a su familia superarse.
texts.en:
Cesar grows basic grains and works in livestock farming.  He is married and has a three-year-old son and it is just the family unit living together.  He distributes his time so that he can both attend to his family and his business.  Cesar has no relatives living abroad to give him economic support.  He learned his trade from his parents in his youth.

Cesar has decided to request a loan to buy farm supplies and cattle to strengthen his business activities.  He hopes to harvest a more abundant grain crop and increase his livestock to sell.  This will increase his income and help pay off debt.

Cesar wants to make good use of the investment to make his business more profitable to improve his family's situation.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies and cattle to strengthen his businesses.

loans.name: Alexis

texts.es:
Alexis, de 29 años de edad, realizo sus estudios hasta noveno grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a la venta de perfumees y desohodorantes, también se dedica a la venta de pupusas los fines de semana y tienen 2 hijos.

Alexis, es pastor evangelico desde hace 10 años y también se dedica a la agricultura y a la albañilería cuando lo necesitan.

El préstamo lo necesita para terminar de construir su vivienda, para tener su casa propia.

Su sueño es, seguir sirviendo al Señor y criar a sus hijos por el buen camino y también darles una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Alexis, 29, has a ninth grade education.  He is married and his wife sells perfumes and deodorants.  She also sells pupusas (stuffed tortillas) on weekends.  They have two children.

Alexis has been active as an evangelical pastor for ten years.  He also works in agriculture and masonry when necessary.

He is in need of a loan to finish building his own house.  His dream is to continue serving the Lord and raising his children on the right path.  He also wants to give them a good education.

loans.use: To finish building his own house.

loans.name: Linda's Group

texts.fr:
Créé depuis le 11 Décembre 2009, les femmes du B.V sont  très solidaires entre elles et ont su par le travail d’ensemble développer une solidarité et un esprit de groupe salué. Elles ont comme activité principale le  petit commerce.

Madame Linda, (debout à l’extrême droite avec une main levée) est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est veuve, âgée de 44 ans et mère de 07 enfants dont 01 garçon et 06 filles. Elle s’active dans l’élevage de porc qu’elle achète dans la région pour les revendre dans la sous région. Elle a une bonne maitrise du travail pour l’avoir effectué pendant plusieurs années.  

Avec son nouveau prêt elle désire acheter 20 porcs à 100 000f, payer un transport de 5000 f par porc et aller les revendre en détails.

Les bénéfices lui permettent de réfectionner sa maison, prendre en charge ses enfants et payer leur scolarités.
texts.en:
Established 11 December 2009, the women of the BV ("Banc Villageois" loan association) are very supportive of each other and were able through common efforts to develop solidarity and a recognized group spirit. Their main activity is small retail trade.

Mrs. Linda (standing at the far right with her hand raised) is the group's featured borrower. She is a 44-year-old widow, mother of seven children including one  boy and six girls. She is active at breeding pigs she buys locally to be resold in the sub-region. She has a good mastery of her business, having practiced it for several years.

With the new loan she wants to buy 20 pigs at 100,000 francs each, pay for transportation at 5,000 francs per pig, and resell them at retail prices.

The profits will enable her to renovate her house, take care of her children and pay their tuition fees.

loans.use: buy 20 pigs at 100,000 francs each, pay for transport at 5000 francs per pig and go sell them retail

loans.name: Noemy Elizabeth

texts.es:
Noemy, está optando por un nuevo préstamo para comprar maíz y leña, tendrá materia prima para elaborar la venta de tortillas, su visión es mantener sus clientes satisfechos para generar ingresos que le ayudan a subsistir con su familia.
Con la buena administración e inversión del crédito anterior en su negocio ha mejorado su situación financiera y las circunstancias familiares. Hasta la fecha no ha tenido dificultades en mantener la continuidad de su trabajo.
texts.en:
Noemy is applying for a new loan to buy corn and firewood, the supplies she needs to make and sell tortillas.  Her vision is to keep customers satisfied in order to generate an income to help support her family.

With proper management and investment of the previous loan, the financial situation of her business and her family circumstances have improved.  So far she has not had any difficulties with continuity in her work.

loans.use: To buy corn and firewood to have the supplies to make and sell tortillas.

loans.name: Lahla

texts.ru: Лахла женщина 60 лет, счастливая мать шести детей и бабушка 15 внуков. Лахла прошла сложную дорогу на пути к счастью и спокойствию. С 12 лет Лахла начала работать, помогала соседям по дому, смотрела за скотом, косила поле, продавала продукты на рынке. С детства она была ребенком с "золотыми руками". Также Лахла прилежно училась и в школе и получала хорошие оценки. В возрасте 18 лет Лахла вышла замуж и переехала в дом к супругу. Через несколько лет Лахла начала свой бизнес-животноводство. Сейчас у Лахлы в стаде 3 коровы и 5 баранов. Лахла несмотря на свой возраст очень любит заниматься своим делам и с удовольствием проводит время на воздухе. Лахла планирует сейчас закупить корм для скота и приобрести молодого барашка. Но у нее нет полной суммы денег, поэтому она обратилась в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Лахла надеется, что МДО Арванд выделит ей нужную сумму и поможет в продвижении бизнеса. Благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en:
Lahla is a 60-year-old woman, a happy mother and grandmother with six children and 15 grandchildren. Lahla has had a difficult road in attaining happiness and tranquility. Lahla began working at 12 years old, helping the neighbors with housework, watching livestock, harvesting hay from fields, and selling produce at the market. She was a child with "golden hands": she learned to do many things, and do them very well. Lahla also studied diligently in school and received good grades. At 18 years old, Lahla got married and moved to her husband's house. After a few years, Lahla began her own animal husbandry business. Today, Lahla has 3 cows and 5 sheep in her herd. Despite her age, Lahla loves working at her own business and happily spends her time outside. 

Lahla is currently planning to buy livestock feed and to purchase a young lamb. However, she does not have the full sum of money this would require, so she has approached MDO Arvand for financial support. Lahla hopes that MDO Arvand will provide her with the sum of money she needs and help her business's progress. She is thankful for the support and trust.

loans.use: to purchase some livestock feed and a lamb.

loans.name: Edgar Osmin

texts.es:
Edgar, de 27 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, está aocmpañado y su pareja se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y al cuidado de su casa; solo tienen una hija, que aún no va a la escuela.

Edgar, tiene un molino de mixtamaza, pero además se dedica a la agricultura para la época de invierno y trabaja en los terrenos de su padre. 

Edgar, necesita el crédito para comprar láminas, arena, bloques y cemento para poder hacer una galera para su molino. 

El sueño de Edgar, es ver crecer a su hija y poder educarla para que cuando sea grande se convierta en una profesional.
texts.en:
Edgar, 27, has a fifth grade education.  His partner raises pigs and takes care of the home, and they have a daughter who is still too young to attend school.

Edgar has a lime corn mill and also works in agriculture in the winter months on his father's farmland.

Edgar is in need of a loan to buy metal sheeting, sand, blocks and cement to build a galley for his mill.  His dream is to raise and educate his daughter so she can have a professional career one day.

loans.use: To buy metal sheeting, sand, blocks and cement to build a galley for his mill.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy metal sheeting, sand and cement to repair her house.

loans.name: Ansatou's Group

texts.fr:
Créer le 16 Décembre 2009 à l’occasion de son inauguration dans la place publique du village, ce banc villageois compte en son sein des femmes déterminées à entreprendre des activités génératrices de revenu et de renforcer leur capacité de financement. Actuellement à son onzième cycle le groupement commence à comprendre le programme. Elles vivent dans un même village depuis plusieurs décennies et entretiennent des relations de solidarité et d’entre aide. Elles s’activent dans le petit commerce. 

Madame Ansatou, âgée de 46 ans (debout à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère 06 enfants dont 03 filles et 03 garçons. Elle s’active dans la vente de vêtements et d’huile de palme et la restauration (vente de dans petit déjeuné).

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter des habits pour femme d’une valeur de 121000 f pour les revendre dans la sous région et 10 bouteilles d’huile de palme à 17500f la bouteille et la revendre en détails.

En plus d’améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille, les bénéfices lui permettront d’aider ses enfants dans la scolarité, les soins médicaux et leur habillement.
texts.en:
Created December 16, 2009 at its inauguration in the village's public square, the "banc villageois" (loan association) comprises women determined  to undertake income-generating activities and strengthen their ability to finance them.
