Veronique owns a shop and she has been in business for the past four years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more soap, sugar, and rice to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy a house.

loans.use: to buy more soap, sugar, and rice to sell.

loans.name: Annah's Group

texts.en:
Annah is a 55-year-old proud mother of nine children. She is a group leader, often described as a very experienced farmer, and is representing her group of four farmers in Matete District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Annah has noticed that she has had more profits from each harvest.

Annah described her harvest as very good last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to rent more land to cultivate.

With this loan, Annah’s Group will be able to plant a total of 4 acres of land and purchase a total of five solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Mey's Group

texts.en: Mey is a potato farmer and worker for other farmers, living in Bovel district of Battambang province. She is  55 years old and a married mother of eight children. She has been involved in her businesses for fifteen years. Because of the lack of funds, she is now leading a group to apply for a loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She will use her loan portion to buy seeds and fertilizer to support her farming. She hopes to earn more income and wants to renovate her old house.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to hire labor to complete digging of one hectare.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy charcoal for resale

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
Jaime, con 34 años de edad, se ha dedicado por 2 años a vender abarrotes en una tienda en el municipio de Carepa; de esta forma complementa los ingresos con los que ha sacado adelante a su sostenimiento.

Su tenacidad y perseverancia le han permitido luchar incansablemente, siempre buscando la manera de salir adelante, esto lo impulsa a solicitar el crédito para comprar surtido al por mayor como mecato, gaseosas, dulces, productos de panadería, entre otros, esto le permitirá continuar con su labor y tendrá más variedad de artículos para ofrecer a los clientes, mejorando así las ventas y los ingresos.

Jaime manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder adquirir una vivienda propia y lograr que su negocio sea mucho más rentable y que le garantice una estabilidad económica favorable para brindar mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

El confía en el apoyo de la Corporación interactuar y en los prestamistas de Kiva para lograr este objetivo.
texts.en:
Jaime, 34, has been selling groceries in a shop in the municipality of Carepa for two years. In this fashion he complements his income, with which he has got ahead.

His tenacity and perseverance have allowed him to struggle tirelessly, always looking for a way to get ahead. This impulsed him to apply for a loan in order to buy stock in bulk such as cakes, sodas, candy, and baked goods, among others. This will allow him to continue his work and he will have a wider variety of products to offer his customers, therefore improving his sales and his income.

Jaime states that his biggest dream is to be able to acquire his own home and see his business become much more profitable, which will guarantee him a favourable economic stability. This will, in turn, allow him to offer his family a better quality of life.

He trusts in the support of the Interactuar Corporation and Kiva lenders to help him achieve this goal.

loans.use: to buy stock in bulk for his general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy iron, tin, plastic, copper, bronze, paper, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fish in bulk and an ice cooler.

loans.name: Morn's Group

texts.en: Morn, 56, lives in Battambang province; she is a mother of three children. To support her family and earn a living, she grows potatoes and works for other farmers for a fee. She has been involved in these businesses for ten years and they earn her about 83,000 KHR per day. Due to lack of funds, she is now forming a group to apply for a loan with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner, to buy seeds and fertilizer and pay the plowing fee. She hopes to earn more money and have the ability to buy more farmland to expand her current business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer and pay the plowing fee

loans.name: St. Maria School

texts.en:
Greetings from Uganda! This is Joseph. He is the Director of St.Maria Day & Boarding School, a mixed school in the Urban area of Kiwatule in Kampala with 300 students.

St.Maria Day & Boarding School has requested a loan to cover the cost of installing and maintaining a UV water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students. The school does not currently have access to consistent clean drinking water and therefore has to spend a considerable portion of its budget on firewood, which is used to boil water for the children. Installing a water filtration system will therefore save the school money in the long-term as the cost of firewood will be reduced. The loan will enable the school to purchase a UV water treatment system with a 450 litre tank, which will be big enough to store clean drinking water for the students every day.

St.Maria School will repay their loan from their school fees, which they collect each term. Joseph ultimately hopes that having access to safe drinking water will improve his students’ concentration and attendance by reducing the number of children that fall sick from water-borne diseases as well as increase the number of students coming to the school.

loans.use: to purchase a water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students.

loans.name: Blanca Gradiola

texts.es: Blanca tiene 42 años de edad, esta casada y tiene 2 hijas de las edades de 16 y 18 años y se encuentran asistiendo al colegio, el esposo de  Blanca se dedica a trabajar de agricultor  en cosecha de naranja, Blanca se dedica  20 años a la actividad de tejidos de lana, Blanca  necesita el dinero de credito para comprar lana ya que comenta que ella adquiere la lana en grande cantidad  y reparte a mas señoras que tambien trabajan tegiendo prendas de vestir en lana y les paga por la mano de obra, Blanca espera que su negocio mejora repartir la lana a mas personas y asi incrementar sus ventas, todo su esfuerzo es para ver alegres a sus hijas asistiendo al colegio.
texts.en:
Blanca, 42, is married and has two daughters aged 16 and 18. They attend school, while Blanca's husband works as a farmer harvesting oranges. Blanca has knitted with wool for 20 years, and she is asking for this loan in order to buy wool. She tells us that she acquires the wool in large quantities and distributes it to other women who also knit woollen garments and she pays them for their work.

Blanca hopes that her business will improve and she can distribute the wool to more people and so increase her sales. All her efforts are in order to see her daughters happy as they attend school.

loans.use: to buy wool.

loans.name: Hoa

texts.en:
Hoa works in agriculture farming food.

Hoa is 36 years old and she is married with 3 children. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Hoa joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Hoa has successfully repaid 1 loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Hoa has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Hoa faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Hoa hopes to maintain a successful business, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Huệ

texts.en:
Mrs Huệ works in agriculture farming food. Huệ is 34 years old and she is married with one child. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2015, Huệ joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Huệ has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. Huệ has been involved in this farming business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Huệ faces in her life is not having a hygeinic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Huệ hopes to maintain  a successful business and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase his business float to make more money transfers as well as deposits

loans.name: Yên

texts.en:
Mrs Yên works in agriculture, farming food. Yên is 25 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2014, Yên joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Yên has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. Yên has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Yên faces in her life is not having a hygeinic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Yên hopes to maintain  a successful business and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Nona

texts.en:
Nona is a hard-working woman entrepreneur with one child.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and she has requested a PHP 22,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy items to sell in her sari-sari store, like canned goods and personal care products.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures, like fattening pigs.

Nona dreams that, one day, she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, like canned goods and personal care products.

loans.name: Fidel Angel

texts.es:
Fidel, con el préstamo anterior tuvo los recursos necesarios para poder tener a su alcance los insumos agrícolas para cultivar maíz y frijol, se siente satisfecho por haber obtenido cosechas abundantes y sin plagas, su familia se mantiene y los ingresos cada vez son mejores. Hasta la fecha  no ha tenido problemas para continuar trabajando.
Nuevamente hace una solicitud de crédito a Padecomsm y a los inversionistas kiva para comprase insecticidas, herbicidas y abono para sembrar granos básicos, su objetivo es no perder la continuidad de su negocio y satisfacer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Fidel, thanks his previous loan, had the necessary resources in order to buy the agricultural supplies to grow corn and beans. He feels satisfied at having obtained abundant harvests and without any infestations. His family is supported and his income is increasing every time. To date he has had no problems with continuing to work.

He is now asking for new loan with Padecomsm and Kiva lenders in order to buy pesticides, herbicides and fertiliser to sow basic grains. His goals are to not lose the momentum of his business and to satisfy his customers.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, herbicides and fertiliser to sow grains.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is a 42-year-old widowed mother of a 10-year-old who is attending school. Christine has owned and operated a bar for the past 15 years. 

With this loan, Christine would like to buy more beer and soda to sell. She will use her business profits to renovate her house and save for a better future.

loans.use: To buy more beer and soda to sell.

loans.name: Shadrack's Group

texts.en:
Shadrack is a 44-year-old proud father of seven children. He is a group leader, often described as a very hardworking individual, and is representing his group of 10 farmers in Matete District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Shadrack has noticed that he has been able to consistently feed his family.

Shadrack described his harvest as good last year, but believes he can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. He is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because he will now be able to reduce their consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this season’s harvest, he plans to send his children to school.

With this loan, Shadrack’s Group will be able to plant a total of 7.25 acres of land and purchase a total of 10 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Asha's Group

texts.en:
Asha's Group is formed by 15 farmers in Matete District and is being represented by Asha, who is the group leader pictured above. She is 40 years old, is married, and has four children. Asha has been a farmer for more than 20 years and is often referred to as a very trustworthy person.

Asha isn’t new to One Acre Fund; she actually joined the program in 2013 and has since noticed her life has changed; especially in the sense that she has been able to consistently feed her family. This year, Asha will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of her loan, but will also purchase a solar light. She is very excited about this addition since now she will be able to reduce their consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Using this loan, Asha's Group will purchase a total of 12 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 8 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Maria Ines

texts.es: Maria esta pasando por los 59 años de edad, Maria es viuda, Maria tiene 7  hijos y comenta que todos sus hijos ya hicieros su vida por aparte o ya  estan casados y ninguno de ellos vive con Maria, esta señora trabajadora se dedica a la venta de papas asadas y comenta que si le va bien en este negocio, a Maria le gustaria mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas, Maria dice que va a trabajar hasta cuando le queden fuerzas y asi no tener  que depender de sus hijos en los gastos sea de alimentacion y salud.
texts.en:
Maria, 59 years old, is a widow. She has 7 children and says that all of her children have made their own independent lives or are married. None of them live with Maria. This hardworking woman sellls baked potatoes and she tells us that if it goes well for her, she would like to improve her business and increase her sales.

Maria says that going to work keeps her strong and so she doesn't need to depend on her children to pay her food or health costs.

loans.use: to buy potatoes.

loans.name: Hudson's Group

texts.en:
Hudson is a 45-year-old proud father of seven children. He is a group leader, and is often described as a very hardworking individual. Hudson is representing his group of eight farmers in Matete District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2013, Hudson has noticed that he has learned a lot from farming trainings.

Hudson describes his harvest as good last year, but believes he can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. He is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, as well as fertilizer and maize, because he will now be able to have an overall improved quality of life. With the profits from this season’s harvest, he plans to rent more land to cultivate on.

With this loan, Hudson’s Group will be able to plant a total of five acres of land and purchase a total of eight solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Andriano's Group

texts.en:
Andriano, pictured above, has been a farmer for 15 years, and he is now proud to represent his group of 14 farmers in Matete District. He is 42 years old, is married, and has 6 children.

Andriano likes to think of himself as a very friendly person. He has been working alongside One Acre Fund since 2013 and decided to represent his group because he wanted to help more farmers. He says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that he has been able to consistently feed his family. Andriano plans to use the profits from this coming season to send his children to school.

In total, Andriano’s Group will receive inputs to cultivate 8.5 acres of land. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of 10 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize

loans.name: Marcela

texts.es:
Marcela es una mujer de 58 años de edad, casada, con hijos independientes, y su negocio es la venta de artículos y alimentos de primera necesidad en su tienda de barrio.
Ella es comprensiva, paciente, buena oyente, solidaria, optimista, de buena actitud, comprometida con su trabajo, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘Max Paredes’ un lugar caracterizado por la venta de ropa por mayor, como: zapatos, chamarras, chompas, mantillas y edredones, etc., de fabricación nacional. De clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 2-14 grados centígrados.
Marcela es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su esposo que es transportista viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de alimentos y artículos de primera necesidad, como; pan, azúcar, fideo, arroz, harina, dulces, agua, refrescos y variedad de artículos en su tienda de barrio. Actividad que realiza todos los días de la semana desde muy temprano por la mañana hasta pasada la medianoche. “el trabajo comienza muy temprano cuando llega el pan y acaba muy tarde cuando el frio es muy fuerte…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes continuos, la desventaja es la falta de capital de inversión para la compra de mercadería. Su sueño es abrir un almacén para la venta de variedad de productos, ella desea abastecer su tienda mediante la compra de variedades de alimentos y artículos de primera necesidad como; arroz, fideo, harina y azúcar por mayor para surtir su puesto de venta y abrir un almacén. Este es la 3 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 20 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Marcela solicita un préstamo para la compra de variedad de abarrotes para surtir su negocio y abrir un almacén.
texts.en: Marcela is a 58 year old woman. She is married with children who are independent. Her business is the sale of basic needs items and food in her neighborhood store. She is understanding, patient, good listener, supportive, optimistic, with a good attitude, engaged to her work, responsible and hardworking. She has her business in the ‘Max Paredes’ area, a place known for selling clothes, made in the country, such as shoes, jackets, sweaters, blankets and bedspreads, at wholesale prices. The weather here is cold and dry, with temperatures varying during the day between 2-14 degrees Celsius. Marcela is of dark skin, with brown eyes, black long hair, which she uses in a pony tail, short, stocky. Her native language is Aymará which she speaks withe her family, and she speaks Spanish as general culture and in her business. She shares her life with her husband, who works as a driver. They live in their own house, built with brick and cement, with corrugated iron roof, drinking water, electricity and sewerage. Her business is selling food and basic staples such as bread, sugar, noodles, rice, flour, sweets, water, soft-drinks, and a variety of items, at her neighborhood store. She works every day from very early in the morning until past midnight. "Work starts very early when the bread arrives and finishes very late when it is very cold...", she comments. The advantage of her business is that she has regular customers; the disadvantage is the lack of investment capital to buy a variety of food and basic staples such as rice, noodles, flour and sugar at wholesale prices to stock up her stall and open a bigger store. This is her third loan cycle with the institution in the 20 years that she has worked in this job. These are the reasons why Marcela is requesting a loan to buy a variety of groceries to stock up her business and open a bigger store.

loans.use: to buy a large variety of groceries to stock up her business and to open a bigger store.

loans.name: Chất

texts.en:
Mr. Chất works in agriculture, farming food. He is 57 years old and he is married, with two children. Chất lives in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2014, Chất joined the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve his business. He has successfully repaid one loan from the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

Chất has been involved in his business for more than ten years. The main hardship that he faces in his life is not having a hygienic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

With his business profit, Chất hopes to maintain a successful business, for his business to do well, and for his family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Oliver

texts.en:
Oliver is a married man from Antequera, Bohol. He is 30 years old and married, with two dependents aged eight and six years. Oliver engages in making native baskets from palm. He sells them to his respective customers, and has been engaged in the business for four years now. 

Oliver is asking for a loan to purchase materials for basket weaving such as buli (palm) and wicker (a woven fiber that is formed into a rigid material). These materials will help Oliver to produce more baskets to sell, thus augmenting his earnings and helping him to provide for the needs of his growing children.

Oliver hopes that he will be able to successfully manage his current livelihood and hopes it will become more sustainable.

loans.use: to purchase materials for basket weaving.

loans.name: Lan

texts.en:
Mrs Lan works in agriculture and farming food, a business that she has been involved in for more than 10 years. Lan is 41 years old and married with three children. She lives and works in Nong Cong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2000, Lan joined Thanh Hoa micro-finance institution to improve her business. She has successfully repaid eight loans from Thanh Hoa micro-finance institution already. But the main hardship that Lan faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipments to build a toilet.

With her business profits, Lan hopes to maintain a successful business, for her children to find a good job, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipments to build a toilet.

loans.name: Đính

texts.en:
Đính, a 50-year-old married mother of two, has been a farmer for more than 10 years. She lives and works in Nong Cong district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2014, Đính joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business, and has repaid her two previous loans. The main hardship that Đính faces is the absence of a hygeinic latrine. She is therefore requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

Đính hopes that her business will continue to be successful, that her family will be healthy and happy, and her children find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of eggs.

loans.name: Linet's Group

texts.en:
Linet's Group is formed by 14 farmers in Matete District and is being represented by Linet, who is the group leader pictured above. She is 31 years old, is married, and has two children. Linet has been a farmer for three years and is often referred to as a very hardworking individual.

Linet isn’t new to One Acre Fund; she actually joined the program in 2013 and has since noticed her life has changed, especially in the sense that she has been able to save more money ever since. This year, Linet will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of her loan, but will also purchase a solar light. She is very excited about this addition since now she will be able to have an overall improved quality of life.

Using this loan, Linet's Group will purchase a total of 13 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 7.25 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Salamat

texts.ru: Саламат, 47 лет, замужем, есть дочь. Она ведет собственное хозяйство в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, стартовав 13 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Саламат, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 коровы, 15 овец, 2 лошади. На арендованном участке мерою 1,20 Га она выращивает ячмень. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 25,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Саламат обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки коровы и нетели. Доходы от кредита Саламат планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и планирует накопить средства на постройку сарая и покупку автомобиля для ее семьи.
texts.en: Salamat is 47 years old, married and has a daughter. For the last thirteen years, she has had a farm that is the primary source of income for the family. Due to her hard work Salamat's farm now has 4 cows, 15 sheep, and 2 horses. She also rents a 1.2 hectare plot of land where she grows barley. Her monthly income is about 25,000 som (KGS). In order to further expand her farm, Salamat requested a loan from the bank Bai -Tushum in the amount of 130,000 som (KGS) to increase her livestock by buying cows and heifers. Salamat plans to invest profits from the loan into increasing her livestock, and she plans to save enough money to build a barn and buy a car for her family.

loans.use: buy one cow and one heifer in order to increase her livestock.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is married and works hard to support her family. She has a charcoal "buy-and-sell" business in the Philippines.

She has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell.

Alma has been in this business for 15 years now. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Aisha

texts.en:
Aisha is 66 years old. She is married with one child, aged 21 years, who goes to school. Aisha sells food stuffs and has been doing this business for the past 10 years. She is a widower. 

With this loan, Aisha would like to buy more sorghum for reselling. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her child, and to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more sorghum for reselling.

loans.name: Gloria Ibel

texts.es:
Gloria, vive con su esposo y un pequeño hijo, considerando que era importante ayudar con los gatos de su familia, se decidió por instalar una tienda de productos de la canasta básica en la que ofrece dulces, frijol, arroz, bebidas, pan, etc., logro hacerlo y con las ganancias ha ido mejorando el inventario y el estilo de vida familiar, trabaja de siete de la mañana a siete de la noche, las ventajas son que tiene muchos clientes por los precios accesibles que les ofrece y desventaja son los precios variables que ofrecen sus proveedores.
Utilizará el crédito para comprar detergentes, jabón, pastas dentales, azúcar, sal, etc., ofrecerá nueva mercadería para que sus clientes estén satisfechos y pueda aumentar sus ventas y sus ganancias, espera adquirir los productos al por mayor para tener oportunidad de continuar ofreciendo buenos precios.
Sus sueños son tener una tienda más grande que le de los ingresos necesarios para cancelar su deuda y apoyar a su hijo para que tenga un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Gloria lives with her husband and young son. Considering it was important to help with the family expenses, she decided to open a convenience store to sell basic need products. She sells candy, beans, rice, drinks, bread, etc.  With the profits she has improved the stocked products and lifestyle of her family. She works from 7 am to 7 pm. The advantage is that she has many customers thanks to the accessible prices she offers, the disadvantage are the varied prices she gets from vendors.
She will use the loan to buy detergent, soap, toothpaste, sugar, salt, etc.  She will offer new merchandise so that her customers are satisfied and increase sales and income.  She hopes to buy the products at wholesale to be able to provide good prices.
Her dreams are to have a bigger store that provides the necessary income to repay the loan and support her son so that he has a better future.

loans.use: to buy detergent, soap, toothpaste, sugar, salt, etc. for her convenience store to satisfy her clientele.

loans.name: Rith's Group

texts.en:
Rith is a rice farmer living in the Bovel district of Battambang province. He is 32 years old and the father of two children; one of them is in school and the other one is too young to go to school. Growing rice and working in construction are the sources of his family’s income to overcome their hardship. He has been involved in these businesses for 10 years and earns about 26,000 KHR per day on the average.

Now he is leading a group to apply for a loan with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner, and will use his portion to buy seeds and fertilizer for his farming. He hopes to earn more income and improve his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Muslima

texts.ru: Муслима 29 летняя добрая и трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. Дочке 10 лет, сыну 7 лет. Муслима с семьей проживает на районе Чилинкуль. Муж Муслимы является школьным преподавателем. Он большое внимание уделяет воспитанию и учебе детей. Муслима успевает заниматься домашними делами и работать на скотном дворе. У нее имеется пару голов крупнорогатых скотин. Муслима приобретает маленьких телят, откармливает их и после перепродает с наценкой. Таким образом, они приносит в дом источник дохода. Несомненно, ей помогает и поддерживает муж. Зарплата учителя является маленькой, и доход от животноводческой деятельности является основной. Муслима хочет расширить деятельность и купить несколько голов телят. Так как необходимой суммы у них не имеется, Муслима с посоветовавшись с мужем, приняла решение обратиться за кредитом. Поддержите Муслиму и ее семью. Спасибо!
texts.en: Muslima is 29 years old, kind and hardworking woman. She is married and has two children. Her daughter is 10 years old and her son is 7. Muslima and her family live in Jilikul. Muslima's husband is a school teacher. He pays a great deal of attention to education and children's learning. Muslima has time to do household chores and work in the barnyard. She has a pair of cattle. Muslima gets calves, fattens them, and then resells them for a profit. This brings a bit of income into the house. She, certainly, helps and supports her husband. A teacher's salary is small, so the animal husbandry is their primary income. Muslima wants to expand her business and buy a few calves. Since she doesn't have the money, after Muslima and her husband spoke, they decided to apply for a loan. Support Muslima and her family. Thank you!

loans.use: expand her livestock.

loans.name: Aulerie

texts.en:
Aulerie is 59 years old. She is married with six children, who are between 7 and 21 years old. They all go to school. She owns a shop and has been doing business for the past 12 years. Her husband is a businessman also.

With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, sugar and maize flour to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children, and she wishes to earn at least 300,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy more rice, sugar and maize flour to sell.

loans.name: Khumor

texts.ru: Жительница района Н. Хусрав 37 лет ее зовут Хумор. Она замужем и мать троих детей. Детям  17, 15 и 5 лет. Ее муж занимается ремонтом дома. Хумор занимается куплю продажей скота уже более 5 лет. Она выращивает крупнорогатого скота. Хумор покупает скота и откармливает их в течение определенного времени и перепродает их на скотном рынке. Она обратилась за кредитом, чтобы расширить свою деятельность. Хумор за счет денег купить скота. Это кредит поможет ей достичь своей целей и улучшить условия жизни семьи.
texts.en: Khumor lives in N. Khusrav 37 years. She is married and the mother of three children. Her children are 17, 15 and 5 years old. Her husband renovates homes. Khumor has been buying and selling cattle for more than 5 years. She raises cattle. Khumor buys cattle and fattens them and then resells them in the cattle market. She applied for a loan to expand her operations. Khumor needs the money to buy cattle. This loan will help her achieve her goals and improve the lives of her family members.

loans.use: buy cattle to expand her business.

loans.name: Yoselin Fanny

texts.es:
Yoselin es una joven mujer de 21 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y estudia la carrera de Medicina. 
Ella es inteligente, responsable, comprometida, constante, dulce, cariñosa, sensible y sincera. Sus estudios lo realiza en una universidad en la zona de Central, área caracterizada por encontrarse rodeada de edificios que albergan a oficinas comerciales, públicas, restaurantes, plazas y todo tipo de comercios, de clima frío y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 4-16 grados centígrados.
Yoselin es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo peinado a la moda, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que casi no habla porque estudia y vive en la ciudad. Su vida la realiza en casa de su padre que trabaja como comerciante y con su hermana que estudiane n colegio. Viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con los servicios de agua potable, energía eléctrica, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Ella cursa la carrera de Medicina y se encuentra en 2 año de 5 años que dura la carrera; disfruta ayudando a las personas, le gusta entender los síntomas de enfermedad, su carácter es de servicio. Paralelamente cuenta con una segunda actividad que es la venta de cosméticos de forma ambulante, como; lápiz labial, perfumes, pintura de uñas, cremas, etc. Negocio que realiza los fines de semana y feriados, “estudio medicina y trabajo en mi negocio, ambas actividades no se cruzan…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es el horario de fin de semana y feriados que le deja tiempo para estudiar, la desventaja es la falta de capital de inversión para ambas actividades. Su sueño es salr profesional para trabajar en un hospital para ayudar a muchos pacientes y desea realizar la compra de una computadora portátil para continuar con sus estudios y finalizarlos. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que se dedica al estudio profesional. 
Es por esos motivos que Yoselin solicita un préstamo para comprar una computadora portátil para continuar con sus estudios y terminar su carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Yoselin is a young 21 year old woman, who's single, childless, and studying medicine.
She's intelligent, responsible, dedicated, persevering, sweet, loving, sensitive and earnest. She's studying at the university in the area of Central, an area known for being encircled by buildings that house commercial offices, public offices, restaurants, public squares and all types of businesses. The climate is cold and dry with temperatures that vary throughout the day between 4-16 degrees centigrade.

Yoselin has a dark complexion, gray eyes, long black fashionably combed hair, short in stature, of slender build, and her native tongue is Aymara. She barely speaks it because she goes to school and lives in the city. She lives her life in her father's house, he works as a salesperson, and with her sister who's a high school student. They live in a house of their own built out of brick and cement with a corrugated iron roof. It has potable water, electricity, gas and sewage. She's studying for a degree in Medicine and is currently in the 2nd year of the 5 year program. She enjoys helping people and likes to understand the symptoms of illness. Serving is in her personality. At the same time she participates in a second activity, which is working as a traveling cosmetics salesperson. She sells; lipstick, perfume, nail polish, creams, etc. She works on this business on weekends and holidays.

"I study Medicine and work on my business, the two don't overlap..." she states. The advantage of her business is the weekend and holiday schedule, which gives her time to study. The disadvantage is the lack of investment capital for both activities. Her dream is to become a professional so that she can work at a hospital and help lots of patients. She wants to purchase a portable computer to continue and finish her studies. This is her first loan application with the institution in the two years that she's been studying for her career. These are the reasons Yoselin is requesting a loan to purchase a portable computer to continue with her studies and finish her degree.

loans.use: To purchase a portable computer to continue her studies and finish her degree.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy repair and maintenance tools for his motorcycle, for faster, effective transportation of his customers

loans.name: Erkebu

texts.ru: Эркебу успешно погасила кредит, использовав его по назначению, она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве Эркебу на сегодня есть 3 коровы, 5 овец, 5 лошадей. Ее прибыль составляет 25,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Эркебу вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 лошадей для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Эркебу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Erkebu has successfully repaid a previous loan, using it for the stated purpose. She is grateful to Kiva Foundation and all those who helped her with financing. Erkebu's farm now has 3 cows, five sheep, and five horses. Her income is 25,000 som (KGS) per month. In order to further expand her faarm, Erkebu asked the bank Bai -Tushum for a loan 150,000 som (KGS) to purchase two horses for breeding. Erkebu plans to invest profits from the loan into further expanding her livestock.

loans.use: buy two horses in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Marie Irene

texts.en:
Marie Irene is 25 years old. She is married with one child, who is three years old. She sells food and has been doing business for the past three years. Her husband is a driver.

With the loan, she would like to buy more shoes to sell. The profits from the business will be used to make savings and improve her standards of living.

loans.use: to buy more shoes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Sophen's Group

texts.en:
Sophen’s Group lives in a rural village in Pailin province, in Cambodia. 

Sophen works as farmer to support his family. 

In his village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean, drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these members to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.

loans.name: Creciendo Juntas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Creciendo Juntas está en su ciclo número tercero del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante, son mujeres muy trabajadoras que quieren crecer y salir adelante.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Hermelinda, quien es modista, ella es muy buena en las confecciones, es por ello que ya tiene muy buena clientela, es una persona que quiere salir adelante, y es por eso que por medio de las capacitaciones quiere poder ir mejorando cada día para poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar telas, hilos, gomas y otros, de manera a poder seguir con sus confecciones como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The group Creciendo Juntas is in its third cycle with the women's committee program, where all women work and are assisted with achieving success. They are very hardworking women who want to grow and succeed. 

One of the members is Hermelinda, who is a dressmaker. She is very good at dressmaking, and for this reason already has good customers. She is a person who wants to succeed, and for this reason through the trainings she wants to continue improving each day to be able to help her family. 

She requests this loan to be able to buy fabrics, yarn, rubber bands and other items, to be able to continue dressmaking.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, yarn, rubber bands, and other items

loans.name: Anorhol

texts.ru: Анорхол 41 летняя замужняя жительница района Шахритус. Она замужем и мать четверых детей. У нее трое сыновей и одна дочка. Детям 15, 13, 11 и 7 лет. Муж занимается фотографом на районе. Он профессионал в своей работе. Анорхол у себя во дворе занимается животноводством. У нее есть коровник, где она выращивает скота.  Анорхол этой деятельности занимается 4 года. Она хочет расширить животноводческую деятельность, путем увеличения поголовья скота. Для купли скота ей необходима определенная сумма денег. У нее не хватает денег, и она обратилась за кредитом. Анорхол заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en: Anorhol  is a married, 41-year-old resident of the district Shahrituz. She is married and the mother of four children. She has three sons and one daughter. Her children are 15, 13, 11 and 7 years old. Her husband is a photographer who works in the area. Anorhol works in animal husbandry at home. She has a barn where she raises cattle. Anorhol has been doing this work for 4 years. She wants to expand her livestock operations by increasing her livestock. She needs money to buy cattle. She does not have enough money, and so she applied for a loan. Anorhol  expressed her gratitude in advance.

loans.use: buy livestock and expand her business.

loans.name: Ruzigul

texts.ru: Рузигул замужем и мать четверых детей. Дети ходят в школу. Она жительница района Кубадиен.  Рузигул очень трудолюбивая женщина. Она на районе занимается земледелием, как другие жители района. Этой деятельностью она занята уже 3 года. В этой работе ей нравится, то, что она может заработать своим честно нажитым трудом. Рузигул закончила посев и сейчас ей необходимо обработать землю минеральными удобрениями, чтобы получить хороший и качественный урожай. Для купли минеральных удобрений ей не хватает не большая сумма денег. Рузигул запрашивает кредит для приобретения минеральных удобрений. Поддержите Рузигул.
texts.en: Ruzigul is married and the mother of four children. Her children go to school. She lives in Qubadiyon. Ruzigul is a very hardworking woman. She farms, like the other residents of the area. She has been doing this for three years. The thing she likes about this work is the fact that what she gets, she earns honestly through her own work. Ruzigul has finished planting, and now she needs to fertilize the land to get a good quality crop. She doesn't have enough money to buy fertilizer. Ruzigul is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizer. Support Ruzigul.

loans.use: buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Vafa

texts.en:
Vafa is a 40-year-old woman. She is living in the Fuzuli region with her lovely son. Her husband died. Her son is going to eleventh grade in the future he wants to be an engineer. They are refugees from Fuzuli city, for over 22 years they have been living like IDPs (Internally Displaced Persons). 

Vafa has been in a poultry business for many years. She is raising chickens, selling their eggs and meat. 

In order to repair her poultry farm, she needs a loan in the amount of 2,300 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). 

Vafa is very grateful to Kiva and their lenders for their help. In the future she wants to help her son with education.

loans.use: to repair her poultry farm,  in the future to help her son with education.

loans.name: Khoa

texts.en:
Khoa is 43 years old and is married with four children. She lives and works in Nong Cong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province. Khoa works in agriculture, farming food. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Khoa faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet. This is Khoa's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With her business profit, Khoa hopes to maintain a successful business. She hopes for her children to find good jobs and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Hương

texts.en:
Hương is 33 years old and a married mother of three. She  lives in Quang Xuong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province, where she has been selling dry food for nine years.

In 2015, Hương joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business, and has repaid her previous loan. The main hardship that Hương faces life is the absence of a hygeinic latrine.She is therefore requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

In the future, Hương hopes for her children to do well in school, her business to succeed, and her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: 21 De Mayo Group

texts.es:
Martha es una mujer de 45 años de edad, casada, tiene 2 hijos, y su negocio es la venta de alimentos y artículos de primera necesidad en su tienda de barrio.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, generosa, paciente, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en el ‘plan 3000’ de la ciudad una zona periurbana caracterizada por agrupar a; productores manufactureros en todas las áreas y comerciantes distribuidores mayoristas, que se encargan de repartir su producción a los diferentes mercados de la ciudad, de clima cálido tropical muy húmedo; con una temperatura ambiente  aproximadamente 21-35 grados centígrados durante todo el año. 
Martha es de tez morena, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado, ojos pardos, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su forma de vestir es tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza (la segunda de la izquierda, viste un delantal azul). Su vida la comparte con su esposo que trabaja y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de alimentos y productos de primera necesidad como; pan, azúcar, harina, arroz, fideo, refrescos, leche y otros. Al llegar la tarde, le ayudan en su labor sus hijos mientras realizan su tarea de la escuela. “mi negocio es una tienda de barrio que debido a la falta de comercio en la zona no cuento con mucha competencia…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que no tiene competencia, la desventaja es la falta de capital de inversión y la gran demanda. Su sueño es comprar un puesto de venta en el mercado, ella desea ampliar su negocio realizando la compra por mayor de abarrotes y material escolar para la venta en su tienda, ya que existe una escuela cercana y demandan esos productos. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 4 años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Martha solicita un préstamo para la compra de abarrotes y material escolar para surtir su tienda y abrir una tienda en el mercado.
texts.en:
Martha is a 45 year old woman who is married and has two children. Her business is the sale of food and basic necessities in her neighborhood store.

She is a good mother, entrepreneurial, generous, patient, responsible and hardworking. She developed her business in the "plan 3000" of the semi-urban area characterized by grouping manufacturing producers in all of the commercial areas of wholesale distributors and traders, which are responsible for distributing their products to the different markets of the city. The city has a tropical and humid warm weather climate, with an ambient temperature of about 21-35 degrees Celsius throughout the whole year.

Martha is of dark complexion, with long black braided hair, brown eyes, short stature, robust physique, and traditional dress (hat, blanket, and skirt). Her maternal language is Guaraní which she speaks with her family, and speaks Spanish in general culture and for her business (she is second from the left, wearing a blue apron). She shares her life with her husband who works and their children who study in school. They live in their own home made of brick and cement with a tin roof along with potable water, electric energy and sewage. Her business is in the sale of food and basic necessities such as: bread, sugar, flour, rice, noodles, soft drinks, milk and others. In the afternoon, her children help her with her work while they do their homework from school. "My business is in the neighborhood store, and due to a lack of business in the area I do not have much competition..." she says. The advantage of her business is that it does not have competition, and the disadvantage is the lack of capital investment and the high demand. Her dream is to buy a stall in the market, she wants to expand her business by buying wholesale groceries and school supplies to sell in her shop because there is a school nearby and they want these products. This is the first loan sequence with the institution in 4 years that she has been doing this activity.

It is for these reasons that Martha is requesting a loan for the purchase of groceries and school supplies to stock her store and open a shop in the market.

loans.use: to purchase groceries and school supplies to stock her store and open a shop in the market.

loans.name: Heyam

texts.en:
Heyam is a 26-year-old single woman from a village near Jericho city. She lives with her family in a small simple house. Heyam started her own business, which is a barn for raising goats, two years ago. She sells the meat and milk in the local market. 

She would like to improve her business and expand it in the future. She took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy more goats for her barn, which will increase her productivity and also her income.

Heyam appears in the photo above.

loans.use: to buy more goats for her barn.

loans.name: Marjona

texts.en:
Marjona is a hard-working woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan. She is living in a small district with her family. She is divorced and has one baby. It was hard for the first time to raise her child alone. 

Marjona has experience with sewing traditional women's dresses. She participated in a three-day training course, provided by CSC MDO IMON International to its clients. She was satisfied with receiving information and learning how to start a business. 

Marjona appealed to CDC MDO IMON International and Kiva lenders to get a loan to buy textiles and other necessary items to sew women's clothes. She hopes to be supported.

loans.use: to buy textiles and other necessary items to sew women's clothes.

loans.name: Fida

texts.en:
Fida is a 27-year-old single man from Ramallah City. He has a cafe in the city center where he makes light sandwiches and soft drinks. It is a very good business and the demand is high. 

Fida would like to open another cafe in a different location, as this will improve his business and enable him to expand his work. He has taken out a USD loan from FATEN which will help him to prepare his new cafe by installing windows and doing some decoration.

Fida appears in the photo in his new cafe.

loans.use: to prepare his new cafe by installing windows and doing some decoration.

loans.name: Hương

texts.en:
Mrs. Hương works in agriculture, raising marine aquaculture. She is 33 years old and married, with three children. Hương has her business in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Hương joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Hương has been involved in this business for more than ten years.

The main hardship that Hương faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Hương hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to do well in school, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Emelyn

texts.en:
Emelyn is 40 years old and married with nine children. With three of her children in school, Emelyn works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Emelyn has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods, and groceries. In the future, she would like to save enough money to continue sending her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Vicky

texts.en:
Vicky is 29 years old and has one child. 

Vicky is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Vicky has been in this business for two years now and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Vicky would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Qamar

texts.en: Qamar is 19 years old and a single man. Lately his family has faced financial problems that prevented him from completing his education. He become responsible for part of the household expenses. Qamar is young for taking on this responsibility, but with his willpower, he has met the challenge. He opened his general store with a low quantity of products, but day after day he developed his business. Now he has applied for a loan to expand his inventory to increase his income. Qamar wishes that he will be able to complete his education in the future.

loans.use: To buy more products to sell in his store.

loans.name: Tayseer

texts.en: Tayseer, 52, is married and the father of two children. He could not complete his education, so he was unable to find a good job with a good salary. He decided to open a business in an empty room in his house making and repairing shoes. Tayseer learned this profession from his dad, and he has worked in this field since he was a child. After one year from the inception of his business, he made a decision to expand his work after he felt his business had become well known in his region. Therefore, Tayseer applied for a loan to buy tools and supplies for his work. By expanding his business, he will be able to meet all the needs of his customers, and he will increase his income.

loans.use: To buy tools and supplies for his shoe repair business.

loans.name: Jenny Valeria

texts.es:
Jenny es un joven estudiante de licenciatura en diseño de interiores, ella solicita un préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos educativo, esta es su historia: Mi nombre es Jenny tengo 27 años, nací en Higuey ciudad ubicada en la zona este de la Republica Dominicana. Actualmente resido en Santo Domingo con mi madre que no está laborando y mi padre falleció hace unos años. 
Tengo deseos de continuar estudiando la carrera de diseño de interiores, llevo 6 cuatrimestres cursados, pero por razones económicas no he podido continuar. En estos momentos necesito el préstamo educativo ya que los ingresos no son suficientes para la matriculación y los demás gastos que estos conllevan.
Mi sueño al terminar mi carrera es poder  brindar mis conocimientos ante la sociedad. Quiero trabajar independiente, en un futuro deseo especializarme  y poder seguir estudiando otras ramas del diseño. Deseo devolver a mi familia todo el apoyo que me da cada día y poder llenarlos de orgullo. Creo que si sueñas con algo y luchas por alcanzarlo  lo puedes lograr ya sea  tarde o temprano!
Esperando ser favorecida bien esta solicitud y que de no recibir este préstamo no podría salir adelante como en verdad deseo, lo que me provocaría un estancamiento y la pérdida de oportunidades que si tengo la ayuda de ustedes la puedo aprovechar.
texts.en: Jenny is a young girl studying an undergraduate degree in Interior Design. She is requesting a loan to be able to pay for her education expenses. This is her story: "I am Jenny, I am 27 years old. I was born in Higuey, a city located in the eastern area of the Dominican Republic. Currently, I live in Santo Domingo with my mother, who is not working, and my father died some years ago. I want to continue studying the career of Interior Design. I have done 6 semesters of four months each, but because of financial reasons, I have not been able to continue. Right now, I need the education loan because our income is not enough for registration and other related expenses. When I finish my career, my dream is to be able to give my knowledge to society. I want to work independently and in the future, I want to specialize myself and keep on studying other branches of design. I want to return to my family all the support they give me every day, and be able to fill them with pride. I believe that if you dream with something and strives to reach it, you can achieve it sooner or later! I hope to be favored with this request. If I were not to get this loan, I would not be able to move ahead as is my wish, which would make me stall and lose the opportunities, which I can use if I have your support."

loans.use: to pay for college education expenses.

loans.name: Julius's Group

texts.en:
Julius's Group is formed by eight farmers in Matete District and is being represented by Julius, who is the group leader pictured above. He is 52 years old, is married and has three children. Julius has been a farmer for more than 30 years and is often referred to as a very trustworthy person.

Julius isn’t new to One Acre Fund, he actually joined the program in 2012 and has since noticed his life has changed; especially in the sense that he has had more profits from each harvest ever since. This year, Julius will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of his loan, but will also purchase two solar lights. He is very excited about this addition since now he will be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Using this loan, Julius's Group will purchase a total of six solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of six acres.

loans.use: to purchase two solar lights, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Barno

texts.ru:
Барно молодая женщина 36 лет. Она родилась и выросла в городе Истаравшан в семьи рабочего.  Она  замужем и имеет троих детей.   Её мужа зовут Илхом. Он занимается дехканством.   Барно по профессии швея. Она хорошо зарабатывает. Её сыновья выросли и работают на стройке разнорабочими. Они также приносят семье хороший доход. 
Этого дохода хватает Барно на проживание. Но у неё есть мечта, Барно со своим мужем  хочет построить большой дом для своей семьи. Но для этого ей необходимы денежные средства. То, что они зарабатывают не достаточно, чтобы позволить себе построение нового дома. Поэтому Барно обратилась в Арванд и  хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для построения дома. Барно надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд  за поддержку.
texts.en:
Barno is a young woman, 36 years old. She was born and grew up in a working family in Istaravshan. She is married and has three children. Her husband's name is Ilkhom. He works on a community farm. Barno is a seamstress by profession. She makes decent money. Her sons are grown and work in construction. They also bring home a decent income.

That income is enough to support Barno. However, she has a dream: she and her husband want to build a big house for the family. But for that, she needs money. They do not earn enough to afford building a new home. Therefore, Barno asked Arvand for a loan to buy building materials to construct the house. Barno is hoping for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Waseemah

texts.en:
Waseemeh is a widowed woman. She is 52 years old and lives in Dair Alla. She is working hard to insure a good life for her children and to help them complete their education to give them a chance to be a successful people in the future. Waseemah is a very ambitious and patient woman. She has faced all the difficulties in educating her children without help from anyone.

She is selling accessories, knitting wool, and woodwork. She is also cooking food and selling it to generate more incomes beside the pension she receives for her dead husband.

Now Waseemah wants to expand her work to improve their standard of living. Therefore she applied for a loan to help her buy more products that she needs to increase her incomes.

loans.use: to buy more products she needs to sell and increase her incomes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover his university fees and achieve his dreams.

loans.name: Mansurbek

texts.ru: Мансурбек житель сельской местности в возрасте 47 лет. Мансурбек женат и у него 2 детей. Сам Мансурбек с малых лет занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Детство у Мансурбека было трудное так, как он вырос в многодетной семье. Родителям Мансурбека приходилось работать очень много чтобы прокормить и обеспечить свою семью. Из за финансовых трудностей в семье Мансурбек не смог получить достойного образования. С детства видя как приходится трудно родителям содержать всю семью он решил заняться земледелием и помогать родителям. От отца он перенял опыт и самостоятельно научился вести сельскохозяйственную деятельность. Сейчас Мансурбек имеет 4 га земли. Он выращивает в основном зерновые культуры, такие как рис, пшеница, кукуруза, рожь. На данный момент Мансурбек испытывает нехватку в финансах для закупки минеральных удобрений. С данной проблемой он решил обратиться в "АРВАНД" за поддержкой. На полученные деньги он хочет купить минеральные удобрения. Мансурбек заранее благодарен за предоставление финансовой поддержки сельским жителям.
texts.en: Mansurbek  is 47 years old and lives in the rurals. Mansurbek is married and has 2 children. Mansurbek has been farming from an early age. Mansurbek's childhood was difficult since he grew up in a large family. His parents had to work a lot in order to feed and provide for his family. Due to financial difficulties in the family, Mansurbek could not get a decent education. Since seeing how hard his parents had to work to support the family in childhood, he decided to take up farming and to help his parents. His father gave him experience and he taught himself to farm. Now Mansurbek has 4 hectares of land. He grows mainly grains, such as rice, wheat, corn, and rye. Currently Mansurbek doesn't have money to buy fertilizer. Hence, he decided to ask Arvand for support. He wants to buy fertilizer. Mansurbek thanks you in advance for providing financial support to villagers.

loans.use: buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Abigail

texts.en: A smiling and passionate business woman, Abigail is 34 years old, married and mother of two children. In order to provide the best for their children she opened a jewelry store in  2011. As an active woman, in addition to her work in a government institution, Abigail is planning to open a water purification plant in the coming months. She currently has some distributors but she would like to become an international company. Abigail motivates people to make payments on time because she offers an installment payment plan. Abigail is asking for a loan of MXN 10,000 to expand the catalog and stock in order to be prepare for Mother's Day in Mexico. Her secret to success is consistency and balancing professional and personal lives. She is a woman who has always worked in sales but would like to learn about accounting in order to be a better financial manager. Abigail's dream is to leave a legacy for her children. Abigail is very grateful to Kiva and lenders because her second loan with Konfío will help her to sell silver and emotions to customers.

loans.use: to expand the catalog and stock.

loans.name: Jazmin

texts.en: Jazmin is 34 years old and lives with her partner and their child. In addition to her job as a legal adviser in an office, three years ago she started a business providing advice and management in occupational pension workers. They focus in the employment rights, social security rights, legal rights, property rights, and even civil and political liberties. Jazmin is a passionate business woman and for that reason, she plans to open a boutique in the coming months. In her spare time, Jazmin likes to swim to feel in balance and relax in order to set new goals. She is very proud of everything she has achieved in order to provide the best education and living conditions for her child. She would like a loan of MXN 12,000 to purchase desks and furniture for her offices in order to provide a better service. In such a way customers will feel confident and the employees will be motivated to improve their job performance. With this loan Jazmin will increase her customers' base and make higher incomes, with which will cover the payments on her second loan with Konfío.

loans.use: to purchase desks and furniture for her offices

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en: Lorena is 48 years old and lives with her husband. For over 20 years she has been an entrepreneur, she had an auto parts business with her husband but they had to close it a few months ago because of security problems. In addition to her job as a secretary at a university, she wants to run a business selling clothes and shoes for men, women and children to increase her income in order to cover the household expenses. Lorena's dream is to become a recognized boutique in the region in order to be financially stable. Lorena knows how to organize her day to fulfill her job and share quality time with her family. The enthusiasm she brings to everything she does is what has helped her to become a successful woman. Lorena would like a loan of MXN 12,000 to purchase clothes and shoes in bulk at a better price. With this loan will be able to increase her profits to make timely payments on her first loan Konfío.

loans.use: to purchase clothes and shoes in bulk

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis is 27 years old and he works by himself he is a cheff and he attends any kind of event where cattering is required he is a very skilfull man for the kitchen he learned very well because he studied Luis business is going very well so he needs a loan to buy more dishes and other items for his chef s business (such as groceries) Luis is living with her parents but he would like to have his own place in the future and to have his own family he hopes you can trust him again.
texts.en: Luis is 27 years old and he works by himself. He is a chef and attends any kind of event where catering is required. He is a very skillful man for the kitchen. He learned very well, because he studied. Luis's business is going very well so he needs a loan to buy more dishes and other items for his chef's business (such as groceries). Luis is living with his parents, but he would like to have his own place in the future and to have his own family. He hopes you can trust him again.

loans.use: to buy dishes, a blender, and other other items for his chef's business.

loans.name: Ruslan

texts.en:
Ruslan is married and has one daughter. He has his own business.

Ruslan has been selling electronics for 10 years. He rents a retail place at the center of the market. The most popular goods for sale are refrigerators and washing machines. Ruslan is an active and hardworking person. He plans to open one more retail place at the market soon.

Ruslan is asking for a loan of 40,000 UAH to purchase TVs, fridges and washing machines. The loan will help to increase the assortment of goods and attract more customers.

loans.use: to purchase TVs, fridges and washing machines for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy potato seedlings

loans.name: Kantutani Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “KANTUTANI” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Cascada, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Candelaria es la Secretaria, la esta vestida con una manta naranja. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ropa, venta de productos por catálogo, tienda de barrio, venta de productos de telefonía, venta de edredones y frazadas.
	
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Candelaria es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promoción masiva de la institución que realizaron en su zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de salchipapa; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de un trabajo anterior, donde era empleada, con ahorros decide emprender un negocio independiente.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de papa por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente, a la elaboración, lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución y le gusta compartir con sus compañeras.
texts.en:
The communal bank "KANTUTANI" is starting their first cycle in Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Focal de Cascada. It is comprised of eight members, and led by a board of directors, of which Candelaria is the Secretary, in the picture you can see her wearing an orange blanket. The members of the communal bank run various types of businesses, including: clothing sales, catalog sales, running a general store, telephone sales, and selling quilts and blankets. 

The loans they receive benefit small business owners including Candelaria. She joined Pro Mujer two years ago, because of a large-scale promotion the institution conducted in her area. She currently has a business selling fried potatoes with hot dogs. She learned this work from a previous job where she was an employee, and then decided to use some savings to launch her own business. 

The loan requested now is for capital growth (buying potatoes at wholesale) which will be purchased from wholesale vendors in La Paz and then prepared, and sold at her food stall. This type of work allows Candelaria to generate income to support her family, as she lives with her common-law husband and has three children. 

When asked what she likes best about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the training programs the institution offers, and she likes to share experiences with her fellow members.

loans.use: to purchase potatoes at wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy seeds

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru: Мухаббат - удивительная женщина, замечательная домохозяйка и просто прекрасный человек. В жизни Мухаббат есть большое счастье, которое всегда ее подержат и придут на помощь. Конечно же, это ее дети. Она мать десятерых детей. Ей на данный момент 41 год. Мухаббат с детьми живет в районе А.Чоми. Она занимается животноводством у себя дома. Мухаббат разводит крупнорогатых скотин. Она приняла решения приобрести еще крупнорогатого скота. Но необходимой суммы у нее нет. Мухаббат надеется получить деньги за счет кредита. Она хочет создать хороший бизнес с хорошим доходом и создать новые экономические возможности для детей. Надеемся у нее все получиться.
texts.en: Muhabbat is a wonderful woman, a wonderful housewife and a wonderful person. Muhabbat has had great happiness in her life which always uplifts and helps her. Of course, this happiness is her children. She is the mother of ten children. She is currently 41 years old. Muhabbat and her children live in A. Jomi. She works in animal husbandry from her home. Muhabbat breeds cattle. She has decided to buy another cow, but she does not have the money. Muhabbat hopes to get money through a loan. She wants to create a good business with a good income and create new economic opportunities for the children. We hope she will succeed.

loans.use: buy cattle.

loans.name: Jamilya

texts.ru: Эту женщину зовут Чамиля. Ей 44 лет. Она жительница района Шахритус. Чамиля  имеет  шестых детей. Детям 20,16,14,8, 5 и 3 лет. Старшие дети учатся в средней школе.  Чамиля активная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она уже 26 лет работает учительницей в средней школе. Кроме школы она еще занимается куплю продажей скота. Чамиля во дворе выращивает скота. Она покупает скота и откармливает их несколько месяцев, потом перепродает их на скотном рынке. Ей в работе помогают дети. Чамила сама зарабатывает и обеспечивает детей. Она решила купить скота и расширить деятельность, путем расширения деятельности увеличиться доход и она может улучшить условия жизни детей. Чамиля с большими надеждами обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en: This woman called Jamilya. She is 44 years old. She lives in Shahrituz. Jamilya has six children. They are 20,16,14,8, 5 and 3 years old. Her older children are in high school. Jamilya is an active and hardworking woman. She has 26 years of experience as a teacher in high school. In addition to school, she buys and sells livestock. Jamilya raises cattle in her barnyard. She buys cattle and feeds them for a few months, then resells them in the cattle market. Her work helps the children. Jamila earns money and provides for the children. She decided to buy livestock and to expand her business to increase profits so that she  can improve the lives of her children. Jamilya has high hopes for the loan.

loans.use: buy cattle.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.ru: Всегда приятно, если человек занимается тем делом что приносит удовольствие. Если превратит любимое дело или просто хобби в доходный бизнес, то в двойне приятно. Вот и повезло Насибе из Турсунзаде. Ей 32 года. Она занимается продажей, скатертей, полотенец, одеял, штор и так далее. Она на дому принимает клиентов. Каждый день она успевает принимать клиентов, обслужить их заодно вести хозяйство и следит за маленьким сыночком. Воспитанием ребенка она тоже занята сама, ее муж на данный момент находится на заработках в российской Федерации. Но она все успевает. Насиба хочет получить в кредит для расширения ассортимента товара и принести новые товары, чтобы привлечь новых клиентов. Она надеется на Вашу поддержку и свою удачу. Спасибо!
texts.en: It is always nice when a person works doing what she loves. When one can turn a pastime or a hobby into a profitable business, then it is twice as nice. One such lucky person is Nasiba of Tursun-zode. She is 32 years old. She sells tablecloths, towels, blankets, curtains and so on. Her customers come to her home. Every day she manages to take care of customers while at the same time farming and watching a small boy. She is also raising a child herself, since her husband is working in the Russian Federation. But she manages. Nasiba wants to get a loan to expand the range of products she has and bring new products in to attract new customers. She looks forward to your support and her own luck. Thank you!

loans.use: buy new goods (towels, bathrobes, slippers, fabric) to attrack new customers.

loans.name: Mastora

texts.en:
Mastora is a hardworking entrepreneur who does business buying and selling vegetables in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase more vegetables to sell through her business.

Mastora has been in this business for four years. She earns more income from a general store and from farming vegetables and coconut.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Mastora has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell through her business

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is 53 years old and has ten children. Melanie is married and has one child who is still in school.

Melanie is in the agricultural business  in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy sacks of feed, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Melanie has been three years now in her business and also earns additional income from her general store. She has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain her businesses.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of feed, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru: Светлана, 48 лет, замужем, есть 4 детей. Она в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 20 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Светланы, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 2 коровы и 35 овец, также она выращивает на собственном участке мерою 2,0 ГА органические клевер, кукурузу. Ежемесячный доход составляет до 23,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 140,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян, удобрений и топлива для проведения весенне-полевых работ. Доходы от кредита Светлана планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Svetlana is 48 years old, married and has 4 children. She started farming 20 years ago, and it is now the family's primary source of income. Due to her hard work, Svetlana's farm now has two cows and 35 sheep, and a 2 hectare plot of land where she grows organic clover and corn. Her monthly income is up to 23,000 som (KGS).
