In order to further develop her business, it turned to the bank Bai -Tushum for a loan of 140,000 som (KGS) to buy seed, fertilizer and fuel for spring field work. Svetlana plans to invest profits from the loan into further developing her business.

loans.use: buy seed, fertilizer and fuel for growing organic products.

loans.name: Thy's Group

texts.en:
Thy is a married woman who lives in a rural area of Tbaung Khmum district of Kompong Cham province. She is 42 years old and has three dependent children. Her family's source of income is  rice farming and being a worker for 22 years.

This is the second loan with VisionFund for Thy’s group, which consists of two members. The previous loan helped her a lot by expanding her current business and providing enough equipment to use. For this loan, she is using a portion to buy home appliances for using in her family. She hopes that she could have a good-looking house and also keep sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy home appliances for use

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Ilyasa

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of Ruma’s agents, Ilyasa. Ilyasa lives in South Bogor, located in West Java, around two hours from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia.  He lives there with his wife and his own child.  He learned about Ruma from one of the sales executives that came to his stall. His community sees him as a trusted and kind mobile provider.

As the business grows, Ilyasa needs additional capital and is seeking a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits to his community. Ilyasa’s goal with respect to Ruma in the near future is to offer an e-commerce business for his community, Ruma’s latest product called Mapan.  Ilyasa is the one seen in the photo. He is thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to give his community better access to communication services by selling mobile airtime credits

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre de 39 años de edad, es casado tiene una linda familia de cuatro hijos de las edades entre 7 y 17 años, esta familia vive en una comunidad de Santa Catarina Ixtahuacan.
Para juan no hay nada más importante que su familia es por ello que para obtener sus ingresos y mantener a su familia trabaja como jornalero y agricultor desde hace 15 años, gracias a estas dos actividades ha logrado sacar adelante  a su familia.
Pero Juan ahora ve la necesidad de adquirir un terreno donde pueda cultivar he incrementar sus cultivos de banano y café, pero él no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para poder comprar su terreno, este hombre tiene una visión de superación y con el afán de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un préstamo para comprar el terreno de 28 x 28 y aumentar su cultivo.
El gran sueño de Juan es construir una casa más grande para su familia.
texts.en:
Juan, 39, is married and has a beautiful family of four children aged between 7 and 17 years old. This family lives in the community of Santa Catarina Ixtahuacan. For Juan, there is nothing more important than family so he has been working as a day labourer and farmer for the past ten years in order to earn money to provide for his family. 

Thanks to these two jobs he has managed to get his family ahead, however, Juan now needs to acquire a piece of land where he can increase his coffee and banana crops but he doesn't have sufficient funds. Juan has a vision for self-improvement and in his eagerness to improve his family’s quality of life he has taken the decision to request a loan to buy a 28x28 piece of land to increase his production of crops.

Juan’s biggest dream is to build a larger house for his family.

loans.use: to buy land to grow coffee and banana plants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow so as to increase milk supply for more income gain.

loans.name: Liên

texts.en:
Mrs. Liên works in agriculture, farming food. Liên has been involved in this business for eight years.

Liên is 31 years old and married with two children. She lives and works in Nong Cong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Liên joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. She has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Liên hopes to maintain a successful business, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Tiến

texts.en:
Mr. Tiến works in agriculture, farming food. He is 64 years old and married, with three children. He lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Tiến's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. He has been involved in this business for more than ten years.

The main hardship that Tiến faces in his life is not having a latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

With his business profit, Tiến hopes for his family to be healthy and happy, for his children to find a good job, and to remodel his house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy saws and other implements for carving purposes to enable him to carve more items for sale in the market.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is extremely happy with the work and improvements she has been able to do to her house. This is the third credit she is requesting to do some improvements to her home. 

Now Marcelina is asking for help to install tile on her floor. This will not only help esthetically, but will help her maintain the house's cleanliness and cover the electric and hydraulic installations. This will help protect her children from the danger of exposed installations and improve their respiratory health.

Marcelina is not able to get credit from other institutions, but is committed to repaying and creating a good credit experience so she might get another opportunity in the future.

loans.use: to buy materials to install a proper floor for her house

loans.name: Teresa  Isabel

texts.es: Teresa de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la siembra de maíz, frijol y maicillo, empezó con capital propio desde muy joven, comercializa sus productos durante todo el año y con las ventas que realiza es como ha logrado salir adelante, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, pesticidas, abonos, semillas, etc. para tener un mejor rendimiento en sus cosechas y asi poder tener mas ganancias poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Teresa, 37, lives in her own home with her two daughters. she makes a living planting corn, beans, and sorghum. she started with her own capital at a young age. She sells her products all year long and with those sales, she is able to move forward.

She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, pesticides, manure, seeds, and more to have a better yield from her crops and to have more income to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides, manure, seeds, and more.

loans.name: Aureliano

texts.es:
Aureliano tiene 50 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su hija y su cónyuge en el distrito de Pomahuaca, sus actividades principales son la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, distrito mediano con aspiraciones a superarse que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de carpintería, cuenta con un taller de carpintería propio el cual se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, dicha actividad la viene desempeñando hace más de 12 años, además cuenta con una pequeña bodega en su domicilio. Por su buen servicio y experiencia cuenta con bastante clientela de la zona quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de madera para implementar su negocio, con esto el espera mejorar sus servicios y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Aureliano is 50 years old. He lives in a common-law marriage. He lives with his daughter and his partner in the district of Pomahuaca. Here, the main work activities are agriculture, commerce and animal husbandry. It is a medium size district with wishes to progress. It is located in the Jaén province, Cajamarca region, on the north Andes of Perú. Aureliano works offering carpentry services. He has his own carpentry workshop, located in his home. He has worked in this job for more than 12 years. Also, has a small grocery store in his home. Because of his good service and experience, he has many customers of his area who give good personal and work references about him. He will use the loan to buy more amount of wood to implement his business. With it he hopes to improve his services and in this way, his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy more amount of wood to implement his business.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es: Santos de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz, maicillo y frijol, tiene 30 años de dedicarse al cultivo, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía y luego las comercializa en las agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos, Santos está solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas semillas, fertilizantes, pesticidas, etc. para poder tener una mejor cosecha y asi tener mejore ingresos y darle a su familia una vida digna.
texts.en:
Santos is 50 years old and lives in his own house with his wife. He earns a living growing corn, millet and beans. He's been dedicated to farming for 30 years.

When his crop is ready, he stores it in the barns shown in the photo and later sells it in the buyer-seller agencies of staple goods.

Santos is seeking a loan to buy agricultural inputs, seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, etc. to be able to have a better crop and thus have better income, giving his family a dignified life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs, seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Victor Raul

texts.es:
Víctor Raúl tiene 63 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el Caserío Limón del distrito de Querocotillo, es una comunidad que se caracteriza por sus bosques verdes, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicado a dos horas de la ciudad de Cutervo, que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de café de la variedad Catimore, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 10 años por lo que cuenta con bastante experiencia. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para darle mantenimiento a su cultivo y de esta manera tener una buena producción para ofrecer a sus clientes a un mayor precio, generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Víctor Raúl is 63 years old and lives with his wife in Caserío Limón in the Querocotillo district. 

It's a community known for its green forests and its people work in agriculture, commerce and livestock. It's located two hours from the city of Cutervo, which belongs to the Cajamarca region in Peru's Sierra Norte.

He earns a living through agriculture, especially growing the Catimore variety of coffee. He's been dedicated to this work for 10 years and has a lot of experience. 

He's asked for a loan to buy compost and fertilizers to maintain his crop and thus have a better production to offer his clients a better price, earning better income for his family.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers to care for his crop.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
Marina, de 63 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, tienen tres hijos pero todos están casados y ya formaron sus propios hogares, solo su esposo vive con ella.

Marina, siembra maíz desde hace 10 años, comenzó ayudandole a su esposo y luego inicio a sembrar sus propios cultivos, anteriormente solo se encargaba de su casa; el lugar donde trabaja está a 10 minutos y viaja a pie.- Su esposo se involucra en el trabajo y su horario es desde 6:00 a.m. hasta las 11:00 a.m. y aveces trabaja en la tarde unas horas.

Marina, necesita el crédito para comprar abono, semilla, veneno, herbicida y otros productos agrícolas para sembrar 14,000 metros cuadrados de terreno, el préstamo mejorara su condición económica.  

Sus sueños son, tener una buena producción de maíz y obtener buena ganancia.
texts.en:
Marina, 63, studied until 9th grade. She's married and her husband earns a living through agriculture. They have three children, but all are married and have their own homes. Only her husband lives with her.

Marina has grown corn for 10 years. She began helping her husband and later started to grow her own crops. Previously, she only took care of the house.

The place where she works is 10 minutes away and she goes on foot. Her husband is involved in the work, and her schedule is from 6am-11am. Sometimes, she works a few hours in the afternoon.

Marina needs the loan to buy compost, seeds, poison, herbicide and other agricultural products to plant 14,000 square meters of land. The loan will improve her economic condition. Her dreams are to have better corn production and earn a better income.

loans.use: to buy compost, seeds, poison, herbicides and other agricultural products to plant 14,000 square meters of land.

loans.name: Surayo

texts.ru:
Сурайё  молодая девушка 26 лет. Она  родилась и выросла в кишлаке Туккуз  Истаравшанского района. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей.  Она очень трудолюбивая женщина. Более   6-лет занимается  деканством. Она арендует 2 га земли, где она выращивает лук, арбузы и дыню. Также она с мужем занимается животноводством.  Имеет 25 голов мелкорогатого скота. 
В данное время Сурайё хочет расширить свое дело по земледелию. Она обратилась в МДО Арванд за кредитом. Она хочет купить минеральные удобрения. Она заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Surayo is a young woman, 26 years old. She was born and raised in Tukkuz, a kishlak [a rural settlement, traditionally for over-wintering] in the Istaravshan region. She is married and has two children. She is a very hard-working woman, and has has been farming for more than 6 years. She rents 2 hectares of land, where she grows onions, watermelons, and melons. She also raises animals with her husband, and they have 25 head of sheep and goats.

Currently, Surayo wants to expand her agricultural business. She has approached MDO Arvand for a loan to buy mineral fertilizer. She thanks MDO Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Mildred's Group

texts.en:
Mildred is a 51-year-old proud mother of six children. She is a group leader, often described as a very trustworthy person, and is representing her group of 11 farmers in Matete District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2013, Mildred has noticed that she has been able to consistently feed her family.

Mildred described her harvest as good last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, in addition to fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to send her children to school.

With this loan, Mildred’s Group will be able to plant a total of 6.25 acres of land and purchase a total of 11 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.
